                     (d)
                     Elimination of limitation on number of vehicles eligible for credit
                     
                        Section 30D is amended by striking subsection (e).
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HEA8BFE58336B4982B2BCC0EC492D3430"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (e)
                     Critical mineral and battery component requirements
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HA2F0A858E1F547DFBC256B851AFC1691"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        
                           Section 30D, as amended by the preceding provisions of this section, is amended by inserting after subsection (d) the following:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="HAEDA774C96584FFDB36915807D3FAAAA"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H7A59ED9B2932459898F6B133D2EC4FF3"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              Critical mineral and battery component requirements
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H173BD5E18F0D4154BAB18A79D5ACEE95"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Critical minerals requirement
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC69FE1091D0D4C83AB6F664F11C9BACF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The requirement described in this subparagraph with respect to a vehicle is that, with respect to the battery from which the electric motor of such vehicle draws electricity, the percentage of the value of the applicable critical minerals (as defined in section 45X(c)(6)) contained in such battery that were—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5112ADE982C04A5EA6878C2708A3C119"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       extracted or processed—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H805AC2AA012748A1A540C0AE9CF70E03"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in the United States, or 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H6C379BE7AFF7438A89668A294DC912C5"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in any country with which the United States has a free trade agreement in effect, or 
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA463CD92FD5E434383AF6D3A3CA9FC61"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       recycled in North America,
                                    
                                    is equal to or greater than the applicable percentage (as certified by the qualified manufacturer, in such form or manner as prescribed by the Secretary).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H58A728057A4F43079BA78221B32EFBFC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Applicable percentage
                                    For purposes of subparagraph (A), the applicable percentage shall be—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H0BD295FC07C541B3A483AAFC1720C36B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service after the date on which the proposed guidance described in paragraph (3)(B) is issued by the Secretary and before January 1, 2024, 40 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1F4AF1159BB54EDE815BCEA7735CE0D9"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2024, 50 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H78AA4EDA9FFA4CF58E6A49D904662B1E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2025, 60 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4AAC9557A7C946418CDA02FA62314EB3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2026, 70 percent, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3293A637CBD14CC897CAF56924CEE4CF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service after December 31, 2026, 80 percent.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H7ED5E3E232CE45B4B2787A675E633821"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Battery components
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1CCE110214DB4C21A1510E9A57A87392"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The requirement described in this subparagraph with respect to a vehicle is that, with respect to the battery from which the electric motor of such vehicle draws electricity, the percentage of the value of the components contained in such battery that were manufactured or assembled in North America is equal to or greater than the applicable percentage (as certified by the qualified manufacturer, in such form or manner as prescribed by the Secretary).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HAEA56EA441B642D9B5DDBBB0B25E458E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Applicable percentage
                                    For purposes of subparagraph (A), the applicable percentage shall be—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4221D3DE14044876B2801A4C00AAC9EB"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service after the date on which the proposed guidance described in paragraph (3)(B) is issued by the Secretary and before January 1, 2024, 50 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC5155518974140E59AEAAC51B78AD483"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2024 or 2025, 60 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBF9083703AD24C88A6A23A5D6E822221"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2026, 70 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3F011E9943104D4780113189140C7D5C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2027, 80 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H87AF41ED251B487F9EF4E25873C5DC67"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service during calendar year 2028, 90 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD67789E5E528492F99B695169D0D3297"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vi)
                                       in the case of a vehicle placed in service after December 31, 2028, 100 percent.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H30CA390CED194E95B7A273FD775765ED"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Regulations and guidance
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H0D41EBBD6AD448E093AB4F67E5D4DDE5"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The Secretary shall issue such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary to carry out the purposes of this subsection, including regulations or other guidance which provides for requirements for recordkeeping or information reporting for purposes of administering the requirements of this subsection.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3C4EF2ECE2AF470F95214729B5009D56"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Deadline for proposed guidance
                                    Not later than December 31, 2022, the Secretary shall issue proposed guidance with respect to the requirements under this subsection.
                                 
                              
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H7B95D24EBA0E4C70A8D9A55E8DEF85A8"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Excluded entities
                        Section 30D(d), as amended by the preceding provisions of this section, is amended by adding at the end the following:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="HCD14DA8A780249AB8182B87259F95481"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H7FC6BDCAF7E5468FA89B31EC57CA41CC"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (7)
                              Excluded entities
                              For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">new clean vehicle shall not include—
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD14DEE48DC1D49EDA88382D5247C6D6A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 any vehicle placed in service after December 31, 2024, with respect to which any of the applicable critical minerals contained in the battery of such vehicle (as described in subsection (e)(1)(A)) were extracted, processed, or recycled by a foreign entity of concern (as defined in section 40207(a)(5) of the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (42 U.S.C. 18741(a)(5))), or
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2680B56B19984C4080B5366954C0D34B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 any vehicle placed in service after December 31, 2023, with respect to which any of the components contained in the battery of such vehicle (as described in subsection (e)(2)(A)) were manufactured or assembled by a foreign entity of concern (as so defined).
                              
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H05CB354AA25A4531A33E8714A4D1B238"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (f)
                     Special rules
                     
                        Section 30D(f) is amended by adding at the end the following:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HA2C061CD50234DE39E0E322CB78B95E0"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="H776A237446FB47239A0E1AC022A0D219"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (8)
                           One credit per vehicle
                           In the case of any vehicle, the credit described in subsection (a) shall only be allowed once with respect to such vehicle, as determined based upon the vehicle identification number of such vehicle.
                        
                        <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="HE615E79917A34339895DE61FFC951389"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (9)
                           VIN requirement
                           No credit shall be allowed under this section with respect to any vehicle unless the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.
                        
                        <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="H0FC3DBC7F2A7406A8E05BC75A19F5452"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (10)
                           Limitation based on modified adjusted gross income
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2B617C30B7FC4A40816C3DE4D6A230AE"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (A)
                              In general
                              No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for any taxable year if—
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HAD7D48A4ED97466EB0756363EE349F08"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (i)
                                 the lesser of—
                                 <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7DF13C454CFC4FC091A681D9926C02F7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (I)
                                    the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for such taxable year, or
                                 
                                 <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1D671D18812D4F60AF2B4EC6E4F61318"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (II)
                                    the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceeds
                                 
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H45E66D2798744E5E8FBC80A64F774DD5"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (ii)
                                 the threshold amount.
                              
                           
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4E81F9C889A84478A67272D330368F7D"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (B)
                              Threshold amount
                              For purposes of subparagraph (A)(ii), the threshold amount shall be—
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H84C8043F862D492994F236B08B3720CD"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (i)
                                 in the case of a joint return or a surviving spouse (as defined in section 2(a)), $300,000,
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HDE64C48B82F748B4AE589FBE493A303D"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (ii)
                                 in the case of a head of household (as defined in section 2(b)), $225,000, and
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H601B3FF2455B4EA79143B3FBCAD141D5"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (iii)
                                 in the case of a taxpayer not described in clause (i) or (ii), $150,000.
                              
                           
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H84391352A45144EDA02A7E594C63157F"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (C)
                              Modified adjusted gross income
                              For purposes of this paragraph, the term ‘modified adjusted gross income’ means adjusted gross income increased by any amount excluded from gross income under section 911, 931, or 933. 
                           
                        
                        <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="H77E3DC63628D406AB6505F88E24081B3"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (11)
                           Manufacturer’s suggested retail price limitation
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H50E297C08FE447E4B2C7F967AF0A7000"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (A)
                              In general
                              No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for a vehicle with a manufacturer’s suggested retail price in excess of the applicable limitation.
                           
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3D19C772EC674FF18A6CA01172EDBFEA"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (B)
                              Applicable limitation
                              For purposes of subparagraph (A), the applicable limitation for each vehicle classification is as follows:
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H050DC473687C48B0AC78FDEBA3DB1ADE"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (i)
                                 Vans
                                 In the case of a van, $80,000. 
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H16E752BE4740472B90A07EF20873B56A"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (ii)
                                 Sport Utility Vehicles
                                 In the case of a sport utility vehicle, $80,000.
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H2410A2B15EE544D299E276A39108296B"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (iii)
                                 Pickup Trucks
                                 In the case of a pickup truck, $80,000.
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H27E06D0CE6CF4433A014D05C12A67B81"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (iv)
                                 Other
                                 In the case of any other vehicle, $55,000.
                              
                           
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H83207DA7931F4B60A478461DA03979A4"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (C)
                              Regulations and guidance
                              For purposes of this paragraph, the Secretary shall prescribe such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary for determining vehicle classifications using criteria similar to that employed by the Environmental Protection Agency and the Department of the Energy to determine size and class of vehicles.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HF92406E16BDC44DC9CF03F282CEF1065"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (g)
                     Transfer of credit
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H82D605411C7347E381FD4C32CC6E016A"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        
                           Section 30D is amended by striking subsection (g) and inserting the following: 
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H57DB55FB409C4191A3A9C489E15FAF18"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H89F228A56C62470F812080B2F66EFF9D"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (g)
                              Transfer of credit
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HC2BBA8DBEF8243B2A1498B2913FAECCE"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 Subject to such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary, if the taxpayer who acquires a new clean vehicle elects the application of this subsection with respect to such vehicle, the credit which would (but for this subsection) be allowed to such taxpayer with respect to such vehicle shall be allowed to the eligible entity specified in such election (and not to such taxpayer).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H796A3D7B13244090955BEDC2D82B0376"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Eligible entity
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">eligible entity means, with respect to the vehicle for which the credit is allowed under subsection (a), the dealer which sold such vehicle to the taxpayer and has—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H52AAF0C10AFA472C9A96A0C6B92AA5AB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    subject to paragraph (4), registered with the Secretary for purposes of this paragraph, at such time, and in such form and manner, as the Secretary may prescribe, 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD072A5E21FD34B048D62AFC192F94248"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    prior to the election described in paragraph (1) and not later than at the time of such sale, disclosed to the taxpayer purchasing such vehicle—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA80D273BCD8D4B1EA5BA96323942EE84"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the manufacturer’s suggested retail price, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H68FA520667F34830AFB85D1073514C2C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the value of the credit allowed and any other incentive available for the purchase of such vehicle, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3AE31B3D2E824DDEACDE81F1BDD06317"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       the amount provided by the dealer to such taxpayer as a condition of the election described in paragraph (1), 
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H18ADCE158EBF4FA089BADD2A5CCFED0D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    not later than at the time of such sale, made payment to such taxpayer (whether in cash or in the form of a partial payment or down payment for the purchase of such vehicle) in an amount equal to the credit otherwise allowable to such taxpayer, and 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA889FFE7F73C4F0E90F76057F1E45815"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    with respect to any incentive otherwise available for the purchase of a vehicle for which a credit is allowed under this section, including any incentive in the form of a rebate or discount provided by the dealer or manufacturer, ensured that—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H81C4CEBCAF7049EF97AFEF48ED09EC8D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the availability or use of such incentive shall not limit the ability of a taxpayer to make an election described in paragraph (1), and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1FD1A89ED2A548B2B14028115BCD2A8F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       such election shall not limit the value or use of such incentive.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF50A8E6F44AF42BCB6917622329D19BA"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Timing
                                 An election described in paragraph (1) shall be made by the taxpayer not later than the date on which the vehicle for which the credit is allowed under subsection (a) is purchased. 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HC51A7380869149758AC234C55D497DE7"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Revocation of registration
                                 Upon determination by the Secretary that a dealer has failed to comply with the requirements described in paragraph (2), the Secretary may revoke the registration (as described in subparagraph (A) of such paragraph) of such dealer. 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H47D5C5C45ED847C48E912CE7ECF9916E"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Tax treatment of payments
                                 With respect to any payment described in paragraph (2)(C), such payment—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFA0C6C6E02074378B7F2F9FB0FE380BF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    shall not be includible in the gross income of the taxpayer, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H992D635A30184CEB86D70382084E985A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    with respect to the dealer, shall not be deductible under this title.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3E4971AF0E0247F3AA25F9C7B53C3A24"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 Application of certain other requirements
                                 In the case of any election under paragraph (1) with respect to any vehicle—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFCD43A59BD154B4ABCF88FB466DF9237"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the requirements of paragraphs (1) and (2) of subsection (f) shall apply to the taxpayer who acquired the vehicle in the same manner as if the credit determined under this section with respect to such vehicle were allowed to such taxpayer,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB951917B4B014567978A63EB31524001"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    paragraph (6) of such subsection shall not apply, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB0ABB5E8DD4B4377ADF9CA1DFC4B6427"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    the requirement of paragraph (9) of such subsection (f) shall be treated as satisfied if the eligible entity provides the vehicle identification number of such vehicle to the Secretary in such manner as the Secretary may provide.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3AA98E66D16C4621A2BF91CF08EA5A5B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (7)
                                 Advance payment to registered dealers
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1AC664ABADBE4948B084486E0F1200DA"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The Secretary shall establish a program to make advance payments to any eligible entity in an amount equal to the cumulative amount of the credits allowed under subsection (a) with respect to any vehicles sold by such entity for which an election described in paragraph (1) has been made. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H4076F127F4CF467DA62CF87EA695D17E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Excessive payments
                                    Rules similar to the rules of section 6417(d)(6) shall apply for purposes of this paragraph. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3DD82E6C4B984288A8BAACA367C70151"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Treatment of advance payments
                                    For purposes of section 1324 of title 31, United States Code, the payments under subparagraph (A) shall be treated in the same manner as a refund due from a credit provision referred to in subsection (b)(2) of such section.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H8F3DEBAC051A4A1FB42A00913FB34744"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (8)
                                 Dealer
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">dealer means a person licensed by a State, the District of Columbia, the Commonwealth of Puerto Rico, any other territory or possession of the United States, an Indian tribal government, or any Alaska Native Corporation (as defined in section 3 of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act (43 U.S.C. 1602(m)) to engage in the sale of vehicles.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H09BAF56F31874667BE560B174C786539"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (9)
                                 Indian tribal government
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">Indian tribal government means the recognized governing body of any Indian or Alaska Native tribe, band, nation, pueblo, village, community, component band, or component reservation, individually identified (including parenthetically) in the list published most recently as of the date of enactment of this subsection pursuant to section 104 of the Federally Recognized Indian Tribe List Act of 1994 (25 U.S.C. 5131).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF9FFE036FC6C49B5A7ECFC6D907F3F07"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (10)
                                 Recapture
                                 In the case of any taxpayer who has made an election described in paragraph (1) with respect to a new clean vehicle and received a payment described in paragraph (2)(C) from an eligible entity, if the credit under subsection (a) would otherwise (but for this subsection) not be allowable to such taxpayer pursuant to the application of subsection (f)(10), the tax imposed on such taxpayer under this chapter for the taxable year in which such vehicle was placed in service shall be increased by the amount of the payment received by such taxpayer.
                              
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H65E0268FEF7A4681B4AB36C708615261"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">

                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H79C0D2BBF18C45439C3DE7387142D9D3"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (h)
                     Termination
                     
                        Section 30D is amended by adding at the end the following:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"

                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HC7C884278DF2495B959496D0B9D2D72D"

                        Section 6213(g)(2), as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended—
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"

                           <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                          display-inline="no-display-inline"
