                                 id="H7D97DB9BDEB34C68B1835DBB395F0E6B"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (6)
                        The table of sections for subpart B of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 is amended by striking the item relating to section 30D and inserting after the item relating to section 30C the following item:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H430B6B1B84EE46429C79D5BCD9FE9D65"
                                       style="OLC">
                           
                              Sec. 30D. Clean vehicle credit.
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H815433634970404A97D3876B36A68A67"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (j)
                     Gross-up of direct spending
                     Beginning in fiscal year 2023 and each fiscal year thereafter, the portion of any credit allowed to an eligible entity (as defined in section 30D(g)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986) pursuant to an election made under section 30D(g) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 that is direct spending shall be increased by 6.0445 percent.
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H756F9563C3A54D7397664E838EBBCD47"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (k)
                     Effective dates
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HA48B1F82E5F44DE58E34A029AEE39AF5"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        Except as provided in paragraphs (2), (3), (4), and (5), the amendments made by this section shall apply to vehicles placed in service after December 31, 2022.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HE577219A0D474DBAAE8CC08CD063742D"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Final assembly
                        The amendments made by subsection (b) shall apply to vehicles sold after the date of enactment of this Act.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H27CA183321AD43669B4D92CD9BD4C8BA"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (3)
                        Per vehicle dollar limitation and related requirements
                        The amendments made by subsections (a) and (e) shall apply to vehicles placed in service after the date on which the proposed guidance described in paragraph (3)(B) of section 30D(e) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (as added by subsection (e)) is issued by the Secretary of the Treasury (or the Secretary's delegate).
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H3C15ECD514174AAEB3AAC86415A35058"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (4)
                        Transfer of credit
                        The amendments made by subsection (g) shall apply to vehicles placed in service after December 31, 2023.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HB6F6EB04E9DB431195211B9E438D5025"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (5)
                        Elimination of manufacturer limitation
                        The amendment made by subsection (d) shall apply to vehicles sold after December 31, 2022.
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H89B8005DE2E748EE9B30E7F19FFD57DB"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (l)
                     Transition rule
                     Solely for purposes of the application of section 30D of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, in the case of a taxpayer that—
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HBF6AE8F15F754C4696AE7FA8D3C93300"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        after December 31, 2021, and before the date of enactment of this Act, purchased, or entered into a written binding contract to purchase, a new qualified plug-in electric drive motor vehicle (as defined in section 30D(d)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of this Act), and
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H4957B4C02417462AB8C8D9D60ED5B6DB"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        placed such vehicle in service on or after the date of enactment of this Act,
                     
                     such taxpayer may elect (at such time, and in such form and manner, as the Secretary of the Treasury, or the Secretary's delegate, may prescribe) to treat such vehicle as having been placed in service on the day before the date of enactment of this Act.
                  
               
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H2F99989D0B454BFC95D1BFB2770FA949"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13402.
                  CREDIT FOR PREVIOUSLY-OWNED CLEAN VEHICLES
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HDCE56FF209B1463CBF8AB380F70D2022"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart A of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 is amended by inserting after section 25D the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H75C30DA827CC4EDE97CD14525A2E2EDB"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="H5901217D0F9440CD9348B57927BDD79D"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           25E.
                           PREVIOUSLY-OWNED CLEAN VEHICLES
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HF780EBA549A34347AAA96BBB47319C7B"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              Allowance of credit
                              In the case of a qualified buyer who during a taxable year places in service a previously-owned clean vehicle, there shall be allowed as a credit against the tax imposed by this chapter for the taxable year an amount equal to the lesser of—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HAAFDCE4DBE86480EB021C6F0F2271D84"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 $4,000, or
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H8065A3E8BDBF4455A8C39350D6E2D966"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 the amount equal to 30 percent of the sale price with respect to such vehicle.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HEC2A356C32984BEDAF44686CBD6BB99B"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Limitation based on modified adjusted gross income
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HCB08CDCC44364EC4BBD6476C77FD9CB5"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) for any taxable year if—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H21164325C08644CE9D6570EC8E97603C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the lesser of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5B6D12EA053A4098BC1A4ED47E8ED84F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for such taxable year, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H123D1DC933A246C9BC1A140E1AEB187B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the modified adjusted gross income of the taxpayer for the preceding taxable year, exceeds
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H2D82E835738645C7B89F8C3845818833"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the threshold amount.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H988A9DD31F6E4A7CB772270EB8EE8CE2"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Threshold amount
                                 For purposes of paragraph (1)(B), the threshold amount shall be—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H58C52B806B8C4499BEB5A47891F562C7"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    in the case of a joint return or a surviving spouse (as defined in section 2(a)), $150,000,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB473C7BEEE2D44A8BADFC0D107047270"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    in the case of a head of household (as defined in section 2(b)), $112,500, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H98012B5AD6184D47945F4FF5C2360C1C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    in the case of a taxpayer not described in subparagraph (A) or (B), $75,000.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA504CFBBDABC459293531F95C4EC2668"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Modified adjusted gross income
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term ‘modified adjusted gross income’ means adjusted gross income increased by any amount excluded from gross income under section 911, 931, or 933.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HFA6132C91E194C2FA01636887AFA30B1"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Definitions
                              For purposes of this section—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H327E490809F449118D72AA0DC9E6A1B9"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Previously-owned clean vehicle
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">previously-owned clean vehicle means, with respect to a taxpayer, a motor vehicle—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H2DED6100079346E28759AFB467E3A092"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the model year of which is at least 2 years earlier than the calendar year in which the taxpayer acquires such vehicle,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HCB025A41B59945ACA5D58BEB7108E74C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the original use of which commences with a person other than the taxpayer,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6A687220FF7D4B7D90DC68E0F916A330"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    which is acquired by the taxpayer in a qualified sale, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H66F50E8383AF487CB609B1691EFB4C35"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8EE43D058C9E4E81AA0D37BC1BF85514"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       meets the requirements of subparagraphs (C), (D), (E), (F), and (H) (except for clause (iv) thereof) of section 30D(d)(1), or 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H645564F1923745B1A717A4016D95DA26"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       is a motor vehicle which—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H25D417538C024F65996E9E5A114956F5"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          satisfies the requirements under subparagraphs (A) and (B) of section 30B(b)(3), and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H5903E282336647AB8BB42E74DD3E6573"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          has a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 14,000 pounds.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4B9237E5093844EDBF1F70B38C13AD1E"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Qualified sale
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified sale means a sale of a motor vehicle—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H58BD766E2B6741F38B9E13252505060E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    by a dealer (as defined in section 30D(g)(8)),
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE5DC49BEC6404E9193B03614F347F55F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    for a sale price which does not exceed $25,000, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD731F5FACD854525B8DDAB652F6640A7"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    which is the first transfer since the date of the enactment of this section to a qualified buyer other than the person with whom the original use of such vehicle commenced.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA3D3FD25BAF84BE3A8B25841370BC2B6"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Qualified buyer
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified buyer means, with respect to a sale of a motor vehicle, a taxpayer—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H851DE13DDAA140AE9928A4A4C6A183F5"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    who is an individual,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HEC1190C49C2E45138C369E52CB1D8040"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    who purchases such vehicle for use and not for resale,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H36375F769908439DAB2C0955CF6D1EAB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    with respect to whom no deduction is allowable with respect to another taxpayer under section 151, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H779CC7F0AF5A4A9894CC468C6663D43B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    who has not been allowed a credit under this section for any sale during the 3-year period ending on the date of the sale of such vehicle.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB66CB6257E8C4792B6EB0B8CACEF3214"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Motor vehicle; capacity
                                 The terms <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">motor vehicle and <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">capacity have the meaning given such terms in paragraphs (2) and (4) of section 30D(d), respectively.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H516CB428491741A9B78AF15857ABF9DB"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              VIN number requirement
                              No credit shall be allowed under subsection (a) with respect to any vehicle unless the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H0DF5027A6618463D887AA7316BDB28E3"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              Application of certain rules
                              For purposes of this section, rules similar to the rules of section 30D(f) (without regard to paragraph (10) or (11) thereof) shall apply for purposes of this section. 
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H11E94F6E23B648A4BD0DD81494DAD6D0"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Termination
                              No credit shall be allowed under this section with respect to any vehicle acquired after December 31, 2032.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HCF129E8485224DB083862F10851EF0B6"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (b)
                     Transfer of credit
                     
                        Section 25E, as added by subsection (a), is amended—
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H247CD771812C441994222D5DBE537676"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        by redesignating subsection (f) as subsection (g), and
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HA56DA5B7AD3C46FFBFD22440B966AF2E"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        by inserting after subsection (e) the following:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H30EFA41F40CE4E298C4BE3B503D12FF6"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HD2F73896ADC44ED5BF0AEA600428D939"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Transfer of credit
                              Rules similar to the rules of section 30D(g) shall apply.
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HB2D975112CC04F8CB229D500869C2A85"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (c)
                     Conforming amendments
                     Section 6213(g)(2), as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended—
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H83B9870332044364B38216C8C37DDD5F"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        in subparagraph (S), by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">and at the end,
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H11A40565C078430C84FB6312863E680C"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        in subparagraph (T), by striking the period at the end and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">, and, and
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H98C9D7C5E48D4EEAB337E1D3041A6CAC"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (3)
                        by inserting after subparagraph (T) the following:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H08E57E4EBC4D4818B168F520F68CCE02"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2F81A1BB05C34A04927661856A4AB1FC"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (U)
                              an omission of a correct vehicle identification number required under section 25E(d) (relating to credit for previously-owned clean vehicles) to be included on a return.
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H4AA394F6BCE0437BB3390F591B15FA3E"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (d)
                     Clerical amendment
                     The table of sections for subpart A of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1 is amended by inserting after the item relating to section 25D the following new item:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HF586415E534E484B9858C587B9B7167F"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <toc container-level="quoted-block-container"
                              lowest-level="section"
                              quoted-block="no-quoted-block"
                              regeneration="no-regeneration">
                           <toc-entry align="left"
                                       bold="off"
                                       idref="H5901217D0F9440CD9348B57927BDD79D"
                                       level="section">Sec. 25E. Previously-owned clean vehicles.
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HCDC561F6132F4A1DADEE5959CCD8E437"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (e)
                     Effective date
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H354E02549C4042F5A5C3C8511A65B4C4"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        Except as provided in paragraph (2), the amendments made by this section shall apply to vehicles acquired after December 31, 2022.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H83C6354202F54C62B243ACBFE724991C"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Transfer of credit
                        The amendments made by subsection (b) shall apply to vehicles acquired after December 31, 2023.
                     
                  
               
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H00754A4D2DB84D60B6BF09E17833867D"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13403.
                  QUALIFIED COMMERCIAL CLEAN VEHICLES
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HD830AA31216C4263803AA67AFA35DA48"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H5F7FA261AF164852ACC3971AC14F8F8B"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="H51183CA97C224FF181A2F4CE7C1E047D"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           45W.
                           CREDIT FOR QUALIFIED COMMERCIAL CLEAN VEHICLES
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H3DDFC43DF9ED48D2B2A3BF5BA0A7E776"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              In general
                              For purposes of section 38, the qualified commercial clean vehicle credit for any taxable year is an amount equal to the sum of the credit amounts determined under subsection (b) with respect to each qualified commercial clean vehicle placed in service by the taxpayer during the taxable year.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HDCD20FDC6B2F4EB68DAFB2BFC4021408"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Per vehicle amount
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HFB85C1454004408E9E1212B24EFA1B70"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 Subject to paragraph (4), the amount determined under this subsection with respect to any qualified commercial clean vehicle shall be equal to the lesser of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H544022B0A52348878DF01755EC80B828"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    15 percent of the basis of such vehicle (30 percent in the case of a vehicle not powered by a gasoline or diesel internal combustion engine), or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3DFF41C653C74D8DA650A07811CF0A03"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the incremental cost of such vehicle.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H8845FBE99E6C4898AF5F1FB56183F476"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Incremental cost
                                 For purposes of paragraph (1)(B), the incremental cost of any qualified commercial clean vehicle is an amount equal to the excess of the purchase price for such vehicle over such price of a comparable vehicle.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4F1EB1F2FDB3432EA1C4A1B831B70233"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Comparable vehicle
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">comparable vehicle means, with respect to any qualified commercial clean vehicle, any vehicle which is powered solely by a gasoline or diesel internal combustion engine and which is comparable in size and use to such vehicle.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HBDEA0B1119014C6D86699C1634B4AC33"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Limitation
                                 The amount determined under this subsection with respect to any qualified commercial clean vehicle shall not exceed—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFE99D4DCCEF64CD4B77487FBFDBA1372"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    in the case of a vehicle which has a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 14,000 pounds, $7,500, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9C39CE9AAFCF45E9851A1DD6B1735841"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    in the case of a vehicle not described in subparagraph (A), $40,000.
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HE512878826C14E39B22D61D658573946"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Qualified commercial clean vehicle
                              For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">qualified commercial clean vehicle means any vehicle which—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H34C8AAEBCF294C2385B38185931DC15B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 meets the requirements of section 30D(d)(1)(C) and is acquired for use or lease by the taxpayer and not for resale, 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6E38BA46B71E4A9E8DF72581AFFC827F"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 either—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H19691B3F5AE74D3AB4929882B01F6313"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    meets the requirements of subparagraph (D) of section 30D(d)(1) and is manufactured primarily for use on public streets, roads, and highways (not including a vehicle operated exclusively on a rail or rails), or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD52264D407014304BAFFA3B75698DC62"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    is mobile machinery, as defined in section 4053(8) (including vehicles that are not designed to perform a function of transporting a load over the public highways),
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2571E71CBF4B4903A427875FB2E6EA60"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 either—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1E4571AC15034C8B80AD932CB60BA547"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    is propelled to a significant extent by an electric motor which draws electricity from a battery which has a capacity of not less than 15 kilowatt hours (or, in the case of a vehicle which has a gross vehicle weight rating of less than 14,000 pounds, 7 kilowatt hours) and is capable of being recharged from an external source of electricity, or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF4ED1F18BFB74C3097C628C2F760FD1E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    is a motor vehicle which satisfies the requirements under subparagraphs (A) and (B) of section 30B(b)(3), and
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2572DEF5F2C44110A294472FFB976C57"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 is of a character subject to the allowance for depreciation.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H0E68B59479C143EEA0CF95B23AE44B3A"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Special rules
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HD36F7F2328124EC0A6D9BD72123D1E1A"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 Rules similar to the rules under subsection (f) of section 30D (without regard to paragraph (10) or (11) thereof) shall apply for purposes of this section.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H5693D3F0D783476AACE4B4FBA633450B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Vehicles placed in service by tax-exempt entities
                                 Subsection (c)(4) shall not apply to any vehicle which is not subject to a lease and which is placed in service by a tax-exempt entity described in clause (i), (ii), or (iv) of section 168(h)(2)(A).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H921A8E34158E4D04874F3BA035694104"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 No double benefit
                                 No credit shall be allowed under this section with respect to any vehicle for which a credit was allowed under section 30D. 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H419C43BDB3B64BF7AF5E06593F7A9E4B"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              VIN number requirement
                              No credit shall be determined under subsection (a) with respect to any vehicle unless the taxpayer includes the vehicle identification number of such vehicle on the return of tax for the taxable year.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H1ED817F33D4E4F669B678C225D557584"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Regulations and guidance
                              The Secretary shall issue such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary to carry out the purposes of this section, including regulations or other guidance relating to determination of the incremental cost of any qualified commercial clean vehicle.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H761FA1A27B7347A2A29B9D92F185FCAD"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (g)
                              Termination
                              No credit shall be determined under this section with respect to any vehicle acquired after December 31, 2032.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H4B779B716F85478BA52CB7B044C9D8BA"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">

                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13404.
                  ALTERNATIVE FUEL REFUELING PROPERTY CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H90814B7F9B274491B042E17781B3ADB1"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     
                        Section 30C(g) is amended by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                quote-display-start="auto"
                                quote-type="text">December 31, 2021 and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                quote-display-start="auto"
                                quote-type="text">December 31, 2032.
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HB78DBFE8098D40C2AE56AD8746624C71"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (b)
                     Credit for property of a character subject to depreciation
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H181E4C02E25D4B3DB7E093617162B586"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        
                           Section 30C(a) is amended by inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">(6 percent in the case of property of a character subject to depreciation) after <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">30 percent.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HA34B161A7EBF48918A747D98E0BBF1F3"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Modification of credit limitation
                        Subsection (b) of section 30C is amended—
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H10F9F3B89A1E4ED2BD15DB668BEB8962"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (A)
                           in the matter preceding paragraph (1)—
                           <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="H0340EF1CBBDB44F69266AD61AA20D4DD"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (i)
                              by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">with respect to all and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">with respect to any single item of, and
                           
                           <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="HD88AF35D1CD243F39883B94AB385D668"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (ii)
                              by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">at a location, and
                           
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H833F93A42C8845529156004EBEF7C25F"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (B)
                           in paragraph (1), by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
