                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">$100,000 in the case of any such item of property.
                        
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HAD68EDB26838433BAFA567CE5AC3D57E"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (3)
                        Bidirectional charging equipment included as qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property
                        
                           Section 30C(c) is amended to read as follows: 
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="HD7325BCC69DF4CE39A99D5A4139F1452"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H02B7FAC6731D4570B76B203A8D74E2C7"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property
                              For purposes of this section—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA32C979AABFA44D49050C61E3C558A5E"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property has the same meaning as the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified clean-fuel vehicle refueling property would have under section 179A if—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE2F5CF955F5C45789F06DD19C1217718"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    paragraph (1) of section 179A(d) did not apply to property installed on property which is used as the principal residence (within the meaning of section 121) of the taxpayer, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD0A628090A6841528CE01AA521C63019"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    only the following were treated as clean-burning fuels for purposes of section 179A(d):
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H029C7FA8C39D459FAB17C761A525EC26"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Any fuel at least 85 percent of the volume of which consists of one or more of the following: ethanol, natural gas, compressed natural gas, liquified natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, or hydrogen.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCC8ACAD34254413DACC16F09B95F6B6A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Any mixture—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HF12AF2DA03684302A8AFD3FB230475D7"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          which consists of two or more of the following: biodiesel (as defined in section 40A(d)(1)), diesel fuel (as defined in section 4083(a)(3)), or kerosene, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H82ADAFDD69A546CFA7A39E5BDADAD905"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          at least 20 percent of the volume of which consists of biodiesel (as so defined) determined without regard to any kerosene in such mixture.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF90BDC6E654A4AF2B01702007CAEC83D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Electricity.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB4F2EA6BF9404FCE9351D8521A9DAE47"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Bidirectional charging equipment
                                 Property shall not fail to be treated as qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property solely because such property—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H2B0424FE54C042268FC94DE2BF5BAE5C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    is capable of charging the battery of a motor vehicle propelled by electricity, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H7A4A8A99DE044BDFBE870F8F55574A3B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    allows discharging electricity from such battery to an electric load external to such motor vehicle.
                                 
                              
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H7AEDA7A992F3421DAEFD1D8045FA770C"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (c)
                     Certain electric charging stations included as qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property
                     
                        Section 30C is amended by redesignating subsections (f) and (g) as subsections (g) and (h), respectively, and by inserting after subsection (e) the following:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H943FCAB694E04AAD9CE1AE909BC1A3B4"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                     id="HC59C995BB9D54055A790523D08AFA4A6"
                                     qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (f)
                           Special rule for electric charging stations for certain vehicles with 2 or 3 wheels
                           For purposes of this section—
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HB39CD4E0CE5F4D0A9C85B710F87D2228"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (1)
                              In general
                              The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property includes any property described in subsection (c) for the recharging of a motor vehicle described in paragraph (2), but only if such property—
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H95CD37213E21463BA165DA0757200850"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 meets the requirements of subsection (a)(2), and
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H9120DA2479B1464E81D4686A75C538EF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 is of a character subject to depreciation. 
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HE154EFE822664649B00334EA43DD6712"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (2)
                              Motor vehicle
                              A motor vehicle is described in this paragraph if the motor vehicle—
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6A9B4BCB38014C2AAFFC80AD3F31B7AF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 is manufactured primarily for use on public streets, roads, or highways (not including a vehicle operated exclusively on a rail or rails),
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H674AC28944AD4968950BC1BFEFEA60CA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 has 2 or 3 wheels, and
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H12CD216E452445EE9FFC14AE85DB5E83"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (C)
                                 is propelled by electricity.
                              
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HD377870A94464533A1F9DD08A590C075"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (d)
                     Wage and apprenticeship requirements
                     Section 30C, as amended by this section, is further amended by redesignating subsections (g) and (h) as subsections (h) and (i) and by inserting after subsection (f) the following new subsection: 
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HFF7BC3E338064C37B13056D642C7E85C"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                     id="H5F6FD8BE7C1E4DB18C9CE3A91EA9F4B6"
                                     qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (g)
                           Wage and apprenticeship requirements
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H756BC7DD64E84EED83DBE06F888E7320"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (1)
                              Increased credit amount
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCA0F52991AE54FA9A6C3964450D7F474"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 In general
                                 In the case of any qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling project which satisfies the requirements of subparagraph (C), the amount of the credit determined under subsection (a) for any qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property of a character subject to an allowance for depreciation which is part of such project shall be equal to such amount (determined without regard to this sentence) multiplied by 5.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5BFF85AD539E45F0B72B16E23973F721"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 Qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling project
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling project means a project consisting of one or more properties that are part of a single project.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H31EED473E3414988B4D55F283118595C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (C)
                                 Project requirements
                                 A project meets the requirements of this subparagraph if it is one of the following: 
                                 <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB06A166ED2C9464BBD396D97A7B1C80A"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (i)
                                    A project the construction of which begins prior to the date that is 60 days after the Secretary publishes guidance with respect to the requirements of paragraphs (2)(A) and (3).
                                 
                                 <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HD204F4FA48DE41E99AF913AFF53B593B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (ii)
                                    A project which satisfies the requirements of paragraphs (2)(A) and (3).
                                 
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H10064852211C478DA6313CA3F95F6171"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (2)
                              Prevailing wage requirements
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H73B3A65710BB488CA31DF5A965B7E693"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 In general
                                 The requirements described in this subparagraph with respect to any qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling project are that the taxpayer shall ensure that any laborers and mechanics employed by the taxpayer or any contractor or subcontractor in the construction of any qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property which is part of such project shall be paid wages at rates not less than the prevailing rates for construction, alteration, or repair of a similar character in the locality in which such project is located as most recently determined by the Secretary of Labor, in accordance with subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HDB4C6A0363924748B3F7DF6EF58A4AFB"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 Correction and penalty related to failure to satisfy wage requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(7)(B) shall apply.
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H04D461D2CA6E4678ABE3F2D73F6E28EB"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (3)
                              Apprenticeship requirements
                              Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(8) shall apply.
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H9CC06C97D99A4B2387B46A1D2ACCF123"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (4)
                              Regulations and guidance
                              The Secretary shall issue such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary to carry out the purposes of this subsection, including regulations or other guidance which provides for requirements for recordkeeping or information reporting for purposes of administering the requirements of this subsection.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H6E8E943031EE45099B1F0102BE3E46CA"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (e)
                     Eligible census tracts
                     Subsection (c) of section 30C, as amended by subsection (b)(3), is amended by adding at the end the following:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HEA96106B8FBC48069CFE2F87414C0C2B"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="HEDFD9790B5544AB89603FA816C8D87CA"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (3)
                           Property required to be located in eligible census tracts
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H619F16C94B6643629E47ED193CCD1350"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (A)
                              In general
                              Property shall not be treated as qualified alternative fuel vehicle refueling property unless such property is placed in service in an eligible census tract.
                           
                           <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6938705F9BCD474F85F2188D9AFD5038"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (B)
                              Eligible census tract
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H438227398A894AD8BF3ACF0F89EFB48F"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (i)
                                 In general
                                 For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">eligible census tract means any population census tract which—
                                 <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H039D7F170AA14CF491FD27EC69F91687"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (I)
                                    is described in section 45D(e), or
                                 
                                 <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H95AB03BA88C549A6B71314246B3F1C1E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (II)
                                    is not an urban area.
                                 
                              
                              <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H47CC572DAF314BAAA5E2A984CE895E12"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (ii)
                                 Urban area
                                 For purposes of clause (i)(II), the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">urban area means a census tract (as defined by the Bureau of the Census) which, according to the most recent decennial census, has been designated as an urban area by the Secretary of Commerce.
                              
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H0DEF90F47F734306A79ABEA02536A1CF"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (f)
                     Effective date
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HE4A6B65123DE4FE88209D0279B92D460"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        In general
                        Except as provided in paragraph (2), the amendments made by this section shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2022.
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HAEF3421004D6408081AD7391F7474E18"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Extension
                        The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2021. 
                     
                  
               
            
            
               5
               Investment in Clean Energy Manufacturing and Energy Security
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H6CAD9EE81D804BC79AAECC200B8B8F09"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13501.
                  EXTENSION OF THE ADVANCED ENERGY PROJECT CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HC5115C6EF99142E38D01D882CC7B541F"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     Extension of credit
                     
                        Section 48C is amended by redesignating subsection (e) as subsection (f) and by inserting after subsection (d) the following new subsection:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H2747B15B9088456894AEC73A41F9315A"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                     id="H66E2C97767E64F1D9853CAE8E580CD23"
                                     qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (e)
                           Additional allocations
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H75B1130CEDBF404286E6DB7D8A332BB2"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (1)
                              In general
                              Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this subsection, the Secretary shall establish a program to consider and award certifications for qualified investments eligible for credits under this section to qualifying advanced energy project sponsors.
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H6192368C89D442C19C6D8C1922A8572C"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (2)
                              Limitation
                              The total amount of credits which may be allocated under the program established under paragraph (1) shall not exceed $10,000,000,000, of which not greater than $6,000,000,000 may be allocated to qualified investments which are not located within a census tract which—
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5D3A7FF361924F28B125FA22D9919120"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 is described in clause (iii) of section 45(b)(11)(B), and
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1A2678C7B56F4D96A5A338755DA767FD"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 prior to the date of enactment of this subsection, had no project which received a certification and allocation of credits under subsection (d).
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H8FBCF3FC7C2142CC9F909B70798B4C18"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (3)
                              Certifications
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HDD56EDE1B3BB4698BA3B2A27919892B3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 Application requirement
                                 Each applicant for certification under this subsection shall submit an application at such time and containing such information as the Secretary may require.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD2D3B4543BEF42E58E90FD683EABEB72"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 Time to meet criteria for certification
                                 Each applicant for certification shall have 2 years from the date of acceptance by the Secretary of the application during which to provide to the Secretary evidence that the requirements of the certification have been met.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H020B45CAB86A4FB591F9406250D4BA68"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (C)
                                 Period of issuance
                                 An applicant which receives a certification shall have 2 years from the date of issuance of the certification in order to place the project in service and to notify the Secretary that such project has been so placed in service, and if such project is not placed in service by that time period, then the certification shall no longer be valid. If any certification is revoked under this subparagraph, the amount of the limitation under paragraph (2) shall be increased by the amount of the credit with respect to such revoked certification.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H18BF6453A3434FF4891E521206CE5274"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (D)
                                 Location of project
                                 In the case of an applicant which receives a certification, if the Secretary determines that the project has been placed in service at a location which is materially different than the location specified in the application for such project, the certification shall no longer be valid.
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HE9915F71B4A14878B68209C29E94E64A"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (4)
                              Credit rate conditioned upon wage and apprenticeship requirements
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H76857B6767874D08B40E2166CEE28578"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 Base rate
                                 For purposes of allocations under this subsection, the amount of the credit determined under subsection (a) shall be determined by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">6 percent for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">30 percent. 
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE066FD44AD944E5893D30EABBB670A47"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 Alternative rate
                                 In the case of any project which satisfies the requirements of paragraphs (5)(A) and (6), subparagraph (A) shall not apply. 
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H1C4A062A865740259012627830A237CD"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (5)
                              Prevailing wage requirements
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7415F406D15248DA9BE79740EA3BEC04"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (A)
                                 In general
                                 The requirements described in this subparagraph with respect to a project are that the taxpayer shall ensure that any laborers and mechanics employed by the taxpayer or any contractor or subcontractor in the re-equipping, expansion, or establishment of a manufacturing facility shall be paid wages at rates not less than the prevailing rates for construction, alteration, or repair of a similar character in the locality in which such project is located as most recently determined by the Secretary of Labor, in accordance with subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code.
                              
                              <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H57593D68C46D47A5AAD9D26197B21C71"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (B)
                                 Correction and penalty related to failure to satisfy wage requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(7)(B) shall apply.
                              
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H0CC83C6ABADD4F11B5890C9DDEB9AF66"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (6)
                              Apprenticeship requirements
                              Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(8) shall apply.
                           
                           <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H184B6A2E8A234AD1BED219BB2CBC60D5"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (7)
                              Disclosure of allocations
                              The Secretary shall, upon making a certification under this subsection, publicly disclose the identity of the applicant and the amount of the credit with respect to such applicant.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H1D01B295C5AD41CEA418D4D3CB170F2E"

                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"

                                    qb-display-quote="yes">

                              re-equipping an industrial or manufacturing facility described in clause (ii) of such paragraph, or

               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="HED782DE55E2C428EAE072814F0BB4218"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13502.
                  ADVANCED MANUFACTURING PRODUCTION CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H7DB9F55CE9304EACB41A5B6579542F3A"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H9DCACCCB83284C00867317919FFF2D38"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="HA0535D14E37D4592984913BCB404DE28"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           45X.
                           ADVANCED MANUFACTURING PRODUCTION CREDIT
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HF2579A24E412448CAE6D515AF9178F9F"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              In general
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB7E95B8BA6D341D0B5407FC01860808C"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Allowance of credit
                                 For purposes of section 38, the advanced manufacturing production credit for any taxable year is an amount equal to the sum of the credit amounts determined under subsection (b) with respect to each eligible component which is—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H966B7972E8694533A84177F72A9D0079"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    produced by the taxpayer, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H898266B0C7064DCD8027E2414D0FF1AB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    during the taxable year, sold by such taxpayer to an unrelated person.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3D62304B694C409CAAB110CCA2342263"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Production and sale must be in trade or business
                                 Any eligible component produced and sold by the taxpayer shall be taken into account only if the production and sale described in paragraph (1) is in a trade or business of the taxpayer.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HD74F0F49870A47F883D95872D6DA5D4D"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Unrelated person
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H140E3D0B89AA468AA84D4790D9627BB0"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    For purposes of this subsection, a taxpayer shall be treated as selling components to an unrelated person if such component is sold to such person by a person related to the taxpayer. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H78771AEBCCD04D42BA4A4628E1EFA576"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Election
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HAF44BA0F80F7467F931E6A6AA4A60180"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       At the election of the taxpayer (in such form and manner as the Secretary may prescribe), a sale of components by such taxpayer to a related person shall be deemed to have been made to an unrelated person.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2235CE0F179B45EE9C71000E23ED27D2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Requirement
                                       As a condition of, and prior to, any election described in clause (i), the Secretary may require such information or registration as the Secretary deems necessary for purposes of preventing duplication, fraud, or any improper or excessive amount determined under paragraph (1).
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H589B84121FA34559B4FF248A30C2DDD3"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Credit amount
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB8DF12FA630C4DDEAFC2B051F83E6D55"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 Subject to paragraph (3), the amount determined under this subsection with respect to any eligible component, including any eligible component it incorporates, shall be equal to—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H39F170585E9348B89950B9B4855294C8"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    in the case of a thin film photovoltaic cell or a crystalline photovoltaic cell, an amount equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H847A799954734C97931CA936B2D7082D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       4 cents, multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H32DAB18462244A39BBC03F255F5DB631"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the capacity of such cell (expressed on a per direct current watt basis),
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H521AEECAA0094AD5A2348A6D764380ED"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    in the case of a photovoltaic wafer, $12 per square meter,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9ECC2385DF544EB9AEFECAE301DE3830"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    in the case of solar grade polysilicon, $3 per kilogram,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H83582F5D3C1247118DA304AE4D920B39"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    in the case of a polymeric backsheet, 40 cents per square meter,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H4F7AD635E9FF48059B9AA0850A68E82D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (E)
                                    in the case of a solar module, an amount equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HECC4DDD21FB44C02ABA91347658E9E08"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       7 cents, multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H98B6BE6D41EE4D2F96C14ED0B3C08D27"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the capacity of such module (expressed on a per direct current watt basis),
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF7C95F0054344F00820F3C7505248B03"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (F)
                                    in the case of a wind energy component—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB401A9E2E86C481890B14405A4D23F97"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       if such component is a related offshore wind vessel, an amount equal to 10 percent of the sales price of such vessel, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5D1B61ACB7DD41AB9D704D57DC5E234C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       if such component is not described in clause (i), an amount equal to the product of—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD774A7EEC6AF4B7D859C2C75D67462C5"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          the applicable amount with respect to such component (as determined under paragraph (2)(A)), multiplied by
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HE80CB71FB5F64E18B0FB19E49408221E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          the total rated capacity (expressed on a per watt basis) of the completed wind turbine for which such component is designed,
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H7472BC6E65514F2A876C588E0ABD9FA7"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (G)
                                    in the case of a torque tube, 87 cents per kilogram,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF8BE33871E0249FAB79AB5D0393D8970"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (H)
                                    in the case of a structural fastener, $2.28 per kilogram,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H83CBD471FECC43DBB23E0DBDF5067EA8"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (I)
                                    in the case of an inverter, an amount equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H36F89F9A44B8454EABDEF098BC7E9018"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the applicable amount with respect to such inverter (as determined under paragraph (2)(B)), multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H287AD99145AF4C4F862C0ADE8A6E665F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the capacity of such inverter (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis),
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFC88BD813A9141C3A9A9E33AED8C53ED"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (J)
                                    in the case of electrode active materials, an amount equal to 10 percent of the costs incurred by the taxpayer with respect to production of such materials,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H339C374C048B4A17A18A15B75B5610AC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (K)
                                    in the case of a battery cell, an amount equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCC20251F93184D3997E46D316ACCF012"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       $35, multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF0F7609EE7E943C7B6141222DC194396"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       subject to paragraph (4), the capacity of such battery cell (expressed on a kilowatt-hour basis),
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H23126B05CA5544FDAE765BE95AF06CD5"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (L)
                                    in the case of a battery module, an amount equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1329AC67CB344909A9DD4EFCC0C77608"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       $10 (or, in the case of a battery module which does not use battery cells, $45), multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD8363F500C0A4DFBAA88E59D9BB81931"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       subject to paragraph (4), the capacity of such battery module (expressed on a kilowatt-hour basis), and
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8A9243122E3C425C8065C293CA8A4178"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (M)
                                    in the case of any applicable critical mineral, an amount equal to 10 percent of the costs incurred by the taxpayer with respect to production of such mineral.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H8AA0376605D54088B686205F6527CA78"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Applicable amounts
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H5F96E5405E0F4297884D3DD87222162F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Wind energy components
                                    For purposes of paragraph (1)(F)(ii), the applicable amount with respect to any wind energy component shall be—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H792D3D9B9E8D480AA25EC4A94D9A8174"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of a blade, 2 cents,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCE0472C84F084136BC2D5F423A86D46A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of a nacelle, 5 cents,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC2F23F13456F4FCEA2FFEBA1E0DEF02C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       in the case of a tower, 3 cents, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H67DA349069B24935B1937BC37C61C474"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       in the case of an offshore wind foundation—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H93ECAFA872DC43078E6D699487973F8E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          which uses a fixed platform, 2 cents, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H6D39EEEAA96A4600996AC7C4628BA681"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          which uses a floating platform, 4 cents. 
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H38290FAB9F4A4CE49DB5C80535271B86"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Inverters
                                    For purposes of paragraph (1)(I), the applicable amount with respect to any inverter shall be—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H63CA1B44D51B4BC69844F32161CD3B4C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of a central inverter, 0.25 cents,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD95204A5DDCE4B18A84AD6977860F4D3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of a utility inverter, 1.5 cents,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA4372C1C778247579213CAB837A8EAAF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       in the case of a commercial inverter, 2 cents,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H26818AE630FD4E7780A5DD3D025B8D41"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       in the case of a residential inverter, 6.5 cents, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE9201D1352884ED3A0ECFCFC588DEBDF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       in the case of a microinverter or a distributed wind inverter, 11 cents. 
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H77F83AF6AB7E42F5B182370C0FB656A9"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Phase out
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H09E7CEA0C8FE4C1D8F40654CC4D61BC6"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    Subject to subparagraph (C), in the case of any eligible component sold after December 31, 2029, the amount determined under this subsection with respect to such component shall be equal to the product of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF82661AA2F1646F2A94E2B645F624E2C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the amount determined under paragraph (1) with respect to such component, as determined without regard to this paragraph, multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8A09E118194E400BA3DC7FAEB25A37D2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the phase out percentage under subparagraph (B).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H10B88C5BE23047E79D33B1DC395CCEF3"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Phase out percentage
                                    The phase out percentage under this subparagraph is equal to—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4A73A48A7964426BAFE5A90092A2E5DF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of an eligible component sold during calendar year 2030, 75 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H84F9CDB929E94E20A79D7431D29060B0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of an eligible component sold during calendar year 2031, 50 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H25FA9630C7844AB2B8EC13A3DB41759C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       in the case of an eligible component sold during calendar year 2032, 25 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HFCC51B5AD63942FCAFF5A9A6CEE7BD28"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       in the case of an eligible component sold after December 31, 2032, 0 percent.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFA40C67034334930B3C3EAC1DFDBA5FC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Exception
                                    For purposes of determining the amount under this subsection with respect to any applicable critical mineral, this paragraph shall not apply.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0375563587894DA7945C08A7A50E4804"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Limitation on capacity of battery cells and battery modules
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H962213CE4EFA425CA94430E907DA200C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    For purposes of subparagraph (K)(ii) or (L)(ii) of paragraph (1), the capacity determined under either subparagraph with respect to a battery cell or battery module shall not exceed a capacity-to-power ratio of 100:1.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFBF19F6B509D441B9A3A1ED343E53DD4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Capacity-to-power ratio
                                    For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">capacity-to-power ratio means, with respect to a battery cell or battery module, the ratio of the capacity of such cell or module to the maximum discharge amount of such cell or module.
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H77C6AE2FF99F4745BAADC66A5C740EF9"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Definitions
                              For purposes of this section—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6054227BB7A7479B817A0E51F99667EE"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Eligible component
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H0BB53897198A41A2876DFAE2A4C0E809"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">eligible component means—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2819578D2C9D463F8A090A938A4597EA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       any solar energy component, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H86B9B3B0AC524FB5AEF11D4A0E6C29F0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       any wind energy component,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1B688B544B8A43398A2041DA798F9008"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       any inverter described in subparagraphs (B) through (G) of paragraph (2),
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB42E3F29500B484785BB67C1CD16E77A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       any qualifying battery component, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H42C6C118E52A42DEA102A39BE1535FF2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       any applicable critical mineral.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC1D86F6AC38844B7B56D9B82A6B2AE70"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Application with other credits
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">eligible component shall not include any property which is produced at a facility if the basis of any property which is part of such facility is taken into account for purposes of the credit allowed under section 48C after the date of the enactment of this section. 
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4BE4879A89254C32BA9EB7BB5BE14D8B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Inverters
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD65454DA93AF43FD8F6FA4BA085BBC01"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">inverter means an end product which is suitable to convert direct current electricity from 1 or more solar modules or certified distributed wind energy systems into alternating current electricity.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H799DADD9028A484585494D8377880A7F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Central inverter
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">central inverter means an inverter which is suitable for large utility-scale systems and has a capacity which is greater than 1,000 kilowatts (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H645D41735B2841E18BA4526C8F9E4EAC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Commercial inverter
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">commercial inverter means an inverter which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H124D9D7BEF164E19B76D6B3F54243404"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       is suitable for commercial or utility-scale applications,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H75391C42EB58432A93D58BC6EE378FA8"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       has a rated output of 208, 480, 600, or 800 volt three-phase power, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC614319305814335903D248CB2FEDA4A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       has a capacity which is not less than 20 kilowatts and not greater than 125 kilowatts (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H542BA2E99ED541EAB6E423B6D846EB7A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Distributed wind inverter
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H69F201A3B5074C1A8CE7546FD5FF1DFD"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">distributed wind inverter means an inverter which—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H8A87718E7A0E49AC92283F895BB442F6"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          is used in a residential or non-residential system which utilizes 1 or more certified distributed wind energy systems, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HA0E35FE16A6D401F9C55C13055E7FDA9"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          has a rated output of not greater than 150 kilowatts.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD864D0190A6241C18102D304B4EB0FB9"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Certified distributed wind energy system
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">certified distributed wind energy system means a wind energy system which is certified by an accredited certification agency to meet Standard 9.1-2009 of the American Wind Energy Association (including any subsequent revisions to or modifications of such Standard which have been approved by the American National Standards Institute).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H684220CF34F248EDAFF2370163E74ABC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (E)
                                    Microinverter
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">microinverter means an inverter which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H930A17AA8DC54D4998D362084E143F5E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       is suitable to connect with one solar module,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA8852C36D3FB46EEA39C7FF004606299"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       has a rated output of—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HE24567DFE2A7442C9EFC3E2CAC8459A8"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          120 or 240 volt single-phase power, or 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H5352A0C57291451593C3BE6D40E40B9E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
