                                          208 or 480 volt three-phase power, and
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC191404E855A4F84B7649B22389B8AFC"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       has a capacity which is not greater than 650 watts (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H40DD766208D9492FB9EF4612122AF117"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (F)
                                    Residential inverter
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">residential inverter means an inverter which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H9377BB01C8244E7DB9F1DE7C02733A52"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       is suitable for a residence,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5678EA2C51C04E0C9D2DD9CD9D1B1D3F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       has a rated output of 120 or 240 volt single-phase power, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H753005E8C6F24BDA80B6B489E803434D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       has a capacity which is not greater than 20 kilowatts (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H257FDA0F866849998FEA511B780194C5"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (G)
                                    Utility inverter
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">utility inverter means an inverter which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4F68B97A8E8D4811B1064A08B0A30946"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       is suitable for commercial or utility-scale systems,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2761AD4F47524E1EB4C2EA1CE403E088"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       has a rated output of not less than 600 volt three-phase power, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H77D94505FE404CE49415473349B30801"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       has a capacity which is greater than 125 kilowatts and not greater than 1000 kilowatts (expressed on a per alternating current watt basis) 
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H33342CF86DAF48D094166A472626FF7C"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Solar energy component
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HBBD8527CD02B478689D1E960D4471A7C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">solar energy component means any of the following:
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H83D1AD9F3F954990A83641AE2B4098DA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Solar modules.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8247512F73FA497699661D765063394D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Photovoltaic cells.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCB7E83BB77F8487EA4274D1055947589"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Photovoltaic wafers.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6F1533927175478C89921DFCB766055F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       Solar grade polysilicon.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD1ABD5401666470080E93A6C846732F7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       Torque tubes or structural fasteners.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H908631CE16B844EAA4308BBFD4EA208D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vi)
                                       Polymeric backsheets.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1A7D9CC587E5439D8D88404BBD46C8DB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Associated definitions
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H87E9F80C192F4AAB9C4E0B79A94845A4"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Photovoltaic cell
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">photovoltaic cell means the smallest semiconductor element of a solar module which performs the immediate conversion of light into electricity.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE5061A71AE1B4FA1A7B24414D314AF07"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Photovoltaic wafer
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">photovoltaic wafer means a thin slice, sheet, or layer of semiconductor material of at least 240 square centimeters—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H97DF607FE4C64822B6A7122D8DC917B3"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          produced by a single manufacturer either—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H9B3D0E4E3A0C4E26B958A4962B3EAD05"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             directly from molten or evaporated solar grade polysilicon or deposition of solar grade thin film semiconductor photon absorber layer, or 
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H30895F4CF40342949F95CC156C23BC42"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             through formation of an ingot from molten polysilicon and subsequent slicing, and
                                          
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD3ABC22944A64B8A977F2A74F7523FED"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          which comprises the substrate or absorber layer of one or more photovoltaic cells.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBC560A0DFAD542D99B6328FA6402C5EE"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Polymeric backsheet
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">polymeric backsheet means a sheet on the back of a solar module which acts as an electric insulator and protects the inner components of such module from the surrounding environment.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC8D4B5F0BBE240AC87273599CECFABA1"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       Solar grade polysilicon
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">solar grade polysilicon means silicon which is—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H60E11E83C6C0427E81930E61D4BA0C22"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          suitable for use in photovoltaic manufacturing, and 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HE17F105AB9DD409C9CC3F583F4D1654E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          purified to a minimum purity of 99.999999 percent silicon by mass. 
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H87B0DFB222B24BC08CC6550B1352A6B6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       Solar module
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">solar module means the connection and lamination of photovoltaic cells into an environmentally protected final assembly which is—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD8E63A9CE53C4C169B1F7D4EB18D7C63"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          suitable to generate electricity when exposed to sunlight, and 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H17C93E29E12C46D18F2129FF0FFBCCCA"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          ready for installation without an additional manufacturing process. 
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HAC5E36D43E4442B4AFD52640197B5B6E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vi)
                                       Solar tracker
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">solar tracker means a mechanical system that moves solar modules according to the position of the sun and to increase energy output.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB57BC5BFDD6642DD92FB17BDB0FAA684"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vii)
                                       Solar tracker components
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H0FE744D772184D77810C108C56D56DB9"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          Torque tube
                                          The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                     quote-display-start="auto"
                                                     quote-type="text">torque tube means a structural steel support element (including longitudinal purlins) which— 
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H040A8819C0274426847DF3DC5287E124"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             is part of a solar tracker,
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HECC172F3E4534FE4A52CFC15E5380ADD"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             is of any cross-sectional shape,
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HF767A8241A8940CBAD0543D317399543"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (cc)
                                             may be assembled from individually manufactured segments,
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H4B1BBFDC338644DAB47189E1A8CB9311"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (dd)
                                             spans longitudinally between foundation posts,
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H1FA15284376B453C88426E8FE7CA795D"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (ee)
                                             supports solar panels and is connected to a mounting attachment for solar panels (with or without separate module interface rails), and
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HC9FBF20CDB074836A700EC48711D9F5E"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (ff)
                                             is rotated by means of a drive system.
                                          
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HB1FA0B911E114532AB7DD6173436BE22"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          Structural fastener
                                          The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                     quote-display-start="auto"
                                                     quote-type="text">structural fastener means a component which is used—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HFB55A3704F584452BFD875202A0B5746"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             to connect the mechanical and drive system components of a solar tracker to the foundation of such solar tracker, 
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H0B831D55F4984292A78774DC06E09B9E"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             to connect torque tubes to drive assemblies, or
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H7AC4A0DC42354D809B2AAF080DD22993"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (cc)
                                             to connect segments of torque tubes to one another.
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0BDBBF79115240909E1B3465FD3E6FCB"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Wind energy component
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8837565606294EC597B1235CF7617337"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">wind energy component means any of the following:
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7577B879A7FD4BC88317000F24C853F3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Blades.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF922A478DDE348ABAB7CE6A3AE3437C1"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Nacelles.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H42A4AC92DDBB4B169087F5D5E491C4E0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Towers.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HEFBB067692404D57915126BEF93E8B19"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       Offshore wind foundations.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H459DF5A78F3E41E798153AD07021D347"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       Related offshore wind vessels.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H46CA1716D5934D3BBAC03DD8A0C51BEF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Associated definitions
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC2F4FA8AB49A4224B3669ADCCD369347"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Blade
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">blade means an airfoil-shaped blade which is responsible for converting wind energy to low-speed rotational energy.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD4FBE19607FD4601A88C36683821F9EC"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Offshore wind foundation
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">offshore wind foundation means the component (including transition piece) which secures an offshore wind tower and any above-water turbine components to the seafloor using—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H9CBE90A01A6A4510AAA247C71D2F2E50"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          fixed platforms, such as offshore wind monopiles, jackets, or gravity-based foundations, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H7EEA64FD484C44EA9FB162478CD4332A"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          floating platforms and associated mooring systems.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H652DFF82E8CD4BC2A7B184DE042E2104"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Nacelle
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">nacelle means the assembly of the drivetrain and other tower-top components of a wind turbine (with the exception of the blades and the hub) within their cover housing.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5392EA366BE54A21882845EEF0DEE4D8"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       Related offshore wind vessel
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">related offshore wind vessel means any vessel which is purpose-built or retrofitted for purposes of the development, transport, installation, operation, or maintenance of offshore wind energy components.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H54210CDEE9654C06BAD42EBE37D6B8A6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       Tower
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">tower means a tubular or lattice structure which supports the nacelle and rotor of a wind turbine.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4B6B59B999334B828948EBBAFE79A682"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Qualifying battery component
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HAA2FC06F22B34E87BF604F80FDEF0490"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualifying battery component means any of the following:
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H710510BF50BA4E5F855F26E012645584"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Electrode active materials.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB87E523035C7456B8C5501DB0958DC08"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Battery cells.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB061410C307F4605B87FDA6891A22945"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Battery modules.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H62B5DC4702F94458B120D6060AEA994A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Associated definitions
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD1433CD103694EB4AB61DD98B299EAD9"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Electrode active material
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">electrode active material means cathode materials, anode materials, anode foils, and electrochemically active materials, including solvents, additives, and electrolyte salts that contribute to the electrochemical processes necessary for energy storage . 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7B91928722CA4EAC95220CB7ECB6FC78"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Battery cell
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">battery cell means an electrochemical cell—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H9AA17C4CCA24434BBB96E89EA3E2BDC3"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          comprised of 1 or more positive electrodes and 1 or more negative electrodes, 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H3D9452A7635246E0A47AB5D6D9988B87"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          with an energy density of not less than 100 watt-hours per liter, and 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HB98F757374DC445B86E18CEDE6D05B30"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          capable of storing at least 12 watt-hours of energy. 
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC35DF8DB131347C2A3CA9A9F8AFC052F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Battery module
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">battery module means a module—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HC46D2375235E4F689FF26D70649778CF"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H0CA543BF3FC34B85838772E1A0589D47"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             in the case of a module using battery cells, with 2 or more battery cells which are configured electrically, in series or parallel, to create voltage or current, as appropriate, to a specified end use, or
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HD6637A586A80415791D765AA51D71EB4"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             with no battery cells, and
                                          
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H9D41960988694EF08D7F1D07567546A7"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          with an aggregate capacity of not less than 7 kilowatt-hours (or, in the case of a module for a hydrogen fuel cell vehicle, not less than 1 kilowatt-hour). 
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2E1FA5C7BB59408B9C32812418E00319"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 Applicable critical minerals
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">applicable critical mineral means any of the following:
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8BFBFED82A21477C8E00C693FB1A6B0F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Aluminum
                                    Aluminum which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H26ADA3745CD84E9999B402F698800581"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted from bauxite to a minimum purity of 99 percent alumina by mass, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H01AD5D3D9B5349859C9F862BE6A5B453"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99.9 percent aluminum by mass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF726802BDE724C13A8A37C5F0452B4E7"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Antimony
                                    Antimony which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H00E315681D6B485B8A8178368822A360"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted to antimony trisulfide concentrate with a minimum purity of 90 percent antimony trisulfide by mass, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCC5981EAEDFF4A46968FD47D42F9D4C8"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99.65 percent antimony by mass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HCE63B06D406B4C1F98761EEF2293D573"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Barite
                                    Barite which is barium sulfate purified to a minimum purity of 80 percent barite by mass.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA192B015B8914E699DEE427591D434C5"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Beryllium
                                    Beryllium which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HFAC045B16E674EFB8F102681B84E347B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted to copper-beryllium master alloy, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H064F2E2A266E4F94B685BBA9D289C291"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99 percent beryllium by mass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB8E6EA5EA4E444D6985E460A4EFF815B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (E)
                                    Cerium
                                    Cerium which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA4C69475228047EA85EA6983336D2112"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted to cerium oxide which is purified to a minimum purity of 99.9 percent cerium oxide by mass, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE9AC7F292BD64515BD0EAB66A18AE9BB"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99 percent cerium by mass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H35AE5489427A43A1A8585C759991590C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (F)
                                    Cesium
                                    Cesium which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB1674F43F4CD4148A9B823B8606C9496"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted to cesium formate or cesium carbonate, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE01291D6B01944BAA49E5283CE25487A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99 percent cesium by mass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H93EF0AE947324FDE87A7CC25AA6585F6"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (G)
                                    Chromium
                                    Chromium which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2C8A762D1BA8417ABB8CBA0B029E53E7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       converted to ferrochromium consisting of not less than 60 percent chromium by mass, or

                                             qb-display-quote="yes">

                                       purified to a minimum purity of 99 percent chromium by mass.

                                                qb-display-quote="yes">

                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H1D755660856B4BBE9F30599665A9CDAF"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Special rules
                              In this section—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6E3E2E26E0CC442798393C621EA816AF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Related persons
                                 Persons shall be treated as related to each other if such persons would be treated as a single employer under the regulations prescribed under section 52(b). 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H00C7CB96A73A4A73973648C40AB4CC5F"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Only production in the United States taken into account
                                 Sales shall be taken into account under this section only with respect to eligible components the production of which is within—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1942CC6E05D54F1EA07CA58D226A25C4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the United States (within the meaning of section 638(1)), or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H504FA9030BFE41DB8046D0FECE165329"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    a possession of the United States (within the meaning of section 638(2)).
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0358290CB6A84C8797E49426CD916C16"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Pass-thru in the case of estates and trusts
                                 Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary, rules similar to the rules of subsection (d) of section 52 shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H97E7DF7855D049DC8375AC60A9E38FB4"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Sale of integrated components
                                 For purposes of this section, a person shall be treated as having sold an eligible component to an unrelated person if such component is integrated, incorporated, or assembled into another eligible component which is sold to an unrelated person.
                              
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HB96DB987300B41DEB8C3C9254BD3F674"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (b)
                     Conforming amendments
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HC64F85A3E22A454BA239D229D41B5285"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        
                           Section 38(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended—
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HC51A62F57DAF4EBB8A1F47A65B39DEE5"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (A)
                           in paragraph (36), by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">plus at the end,
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HDC39C978B1E34E3EA3AB234F7CDA475B"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (B)
                           in paragraph (37), by striking the period at the end and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">, plus, and
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HF40DBD0F14544029B3EE4A57842599A5"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (C)
                           by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
                           <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                          display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          display-quotes="yes"
                                          id="HE0A27BF29AA841C998C5E6857F21E48B"
                                          style="OLC">
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4B39327BD2EE44858C1DB659E6D685FD"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (38)
                                 the advanced manufacturing production credit determined under section 45X(a).
                              
                              .
                           
                        
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H185CD65A84434217B1A58AA22C888189"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        The table of sections for subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new item:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="HF390D844B84B48E88EEAAF64DE09A0E7"
                                       style="OLC">
                           
                              Sec. 45X. Advanced manufacturing production credit.
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HCFD09B113F1C473DB0F9A476737CAE29"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (c)
                     Effective date
                     The amendments made by this section shall apply to components produced and sold after December 31, 2022. 
                  
               
            
            
               6
               Superfund
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H5AECC33334F647978524B83557E5AD7F"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13601.
                  REINSTATEMENT OF SUPERFUND
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HF9B0F9CF8BEF47CD98C7EAF32F0DDA6C"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                      Hazardous Substance Superfund financing rate
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H6EC830A9F6E344B5815F7FE7DFE2E87D"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        Extension
                        
                           Section 4611 is amended by striking subsection (e).
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H8E06CC31F9374B10A4F9F45E3134DAB5"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        Adjustment for inflation
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H8D40EAF243084F268A6F500299390185"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (A)
                           
                              Section 4611(c)(2)(A) is amended by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">9.7 cents and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">16.4 cents.
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HF3A458A6AEF94D7087D71C433E0F9B20"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (B)
                           
                              Section 4611(c) is amended by adding at the end the following:
                           <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                          display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          display-quotes="yes"
                                          id="H20419C6BC0764C30AD0DE8866F9382BD"
                                          style="OLC">
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6D11F7A622E04A4FAF1047D8D73D409A"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Adjustment for inflation
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H77933A07AAB04CB2A043FB3291D61278"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    In the case of a year beginning after 2023, the amount in paragraph (2)(A) shall be increased by an amount equal to—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF7AEEAEB06FE4E2197A2D6B8EA206325"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       such amount, multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF5F2B36D18E64A2D809CA79038791C30"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year, determined by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">calendar year 2022 for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">calendar year 2016 in subparagraph (A)(ii) thereof.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H96FE1AB42631415F977CE85FBA291181"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Rounding
                                    If any amount as adjusted under subparagraph (A) is not a multiple of $0.01, such amount shall be rounded to the next lowest multiple of $0.01.
                                 
                              
                              .
                           
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H02283A60893C4FB8AAC7AEB7AF340F3B"

                     Authority for advances

                                quote-display-start="auto"

                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"

                               qb-display-quote="yes">

               7
               Incentives for Clean Electricity and Clean Transportation
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="HAEB618E7913542AB96DBC3E079D71D4F"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13701.
                  CLEAN ELECTRICITY PRODUCTION CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H5D44D8402A2744E4B72642CA6E300282"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HAE612A5E4F99431AA22B2013613B844D"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="H05F9009F988F4FF4BB6BB8333687BFAC"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           45Y.
                           CLEAN ELECTRICITY PRODUCTION CREDIT
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H36C0B981F03646FC95597A81C202B68C"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              Amount of credit
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H060E02C2640040029CEDBBB4C40259E3"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 For purposes of section 38, the clean electricity production credit for any taxable year is an amount equal to the product of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3FED6A70C0E14CBFA34349C6501D24DA"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the kilowatt hours of electricity—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBE9C5EB9F483462688DCEDB4BB82738B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       produced by the taxpayer at a qualified facility, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE23422E984E14978A32EBCF9260A22C0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H8FFC04A061F94E7284032368553FBFEC"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          sold by the taxpayer to an unrelated person during the taxable year, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H49F0600190DC4B41B5CF701442A11959"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in the case of a qualified facility which is equipped with a metering device which is owned and operated by an unrelated person, sold, consumed, or stored by the taxpayer during the taxable year, multiplied by
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H4C7B2F4C4D3C4C71ACE04C21DAB22407"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the applicable amount with respect to such qualified facility.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H97850CAFA1D04F508CA94A5E40929A7B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Applicable amount
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6EE4F31DBB1C481297289B5B3FD1C4EA"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Base amount
                                    Subject to subsection (g)(7), in the case of any qualified facility which is not described in clause (i) or (ii) of subparagraph (B) and does not satisfy the requirements described in clause (iii) of such subparagraph, the applicable amount shall be 0.3 cents.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB97863C2BAF7496A9F8A74701B55F501"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Alternative amount
                                    Subject to subsection (g)(7), in the case of any qualified facility—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H75C2BD9F06464289974219A04E6B976D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       with a maximum net output of less than 1 megawatt (as measured in alternating current), 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCD4C746AE67A4F5C821906CE94095591"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the construction of which begins prior to the date that is 60 days after the Secretary publishes guidance with respect to the requirements of paragraphs (9) and (10) of subsection (g), or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1E459E94E4044CD1BA640B19A7129663"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       which—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H65AB2FB45C83438BB03D59B0DFAE9749"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          satisfies the requirements under paragraph (9) of subsection (g), and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H8D155DF2CA6D49ED87D496D4E083DBAF"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          with respect to the construction of such facility, satisfies the requirements under paragraph (10) of subsection (g), 
                                       
                                    
                                    the applicable amount shall be 1.5 cents. 
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H152030ECFBEC43D6AA782E4AFF428D16"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Qualified facility
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HEF6F15F062B54F25B0C031296D276E18"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H01089E26A43540CD856CB7406B45C20A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Definition
                                    Subject to subparagraphs (B), (C), and (D), the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualified facility means a facility owned by the taxpayer—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H82FBF41812EC48ADAF6F729F641A81F0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       which is used for the generation of electricity,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H356672F676EA4FB48DE2DEF2289C0E96"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       which is placed in service after December 31, 2024, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HE9C65879E60645EEB740C38B26B8A5AF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       for which the greenhouse gas emissions rate (as determined under paragraph (2)) is not greater than zero.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA4A82D576A944BF0B301E2D22A108D4E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    10-year production credit
                                    For purposes of this section, a facility shall only be treated as a qualified facility during the 10-year period beginning on the date the facility was originally placed in service.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC972CDBC01544480A112AEF2101872D7"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Expansion of facility; incremental production
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualified facility shall include either of the following in connection with a facility described in subparagraph (A) (without regard to clause (ii) of such subparagraph) which was placed in service before January 1, 2025, but only to the extent of the increased amount of electricity produced at the facility by reason of the following:
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H498E2D829F6849BBB784A27DA37AEE77"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       A new unit which is placed in service after December 31, 2024.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H72650651EA01485BBE6BA10B783AE377"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Any additions of capacity which are placed in service after December 31, 2024.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE713763A8F7A4FF597C736D4E791A8C6"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Coordination with other credits
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualified facility shall not include any facility for which a credit determined under section 45, 45J, 45Q, 45U, 48, 48A, or 48E is allowed under section 38 for the taxable year or any prior taxable year.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0F3637A07E3C459F89F69C71976529DC"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Greenhouse gas emissions rate
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC5939A6D575B4792930C3229C8CF581A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">greenhouse gas emissions rate means the amount of greenhouse gases emitted into the atmosphere by a facility in the production of electricity, expressed as grams of CO2e per KWh.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H0C0A39C4571B42D0B0FD3B094BC8D2D9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Fuel combustion and gasification
                                    In the case of a facility which produces electricity through combustion or gasification, the greenhouse gas emissions rate for such facility shall be equal to the net rate of greenhouse gases emitted into the atmosphere by such facility (taking into account lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions, as described in section 211(o)(1)(H) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)(1)(H))) in the production of electricity, expressed as grams of CO2e per KWh.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H597953363C544E4A8D1E164DCE046A88"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Establishment of emissions rates for facilities
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H9A805C63F6154FC0A7802D3FBC39EAAA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Publishing emissions rates
                                       The Secretary shall annually publish a table that sets forth the greenhouse gas emissions rates for types or categories of facilities, which a taxpayer shall use for purposes of this section.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7A36CB298C154E66B40B905E9CFDD573"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Provisional emissions rate
                                       In the case of any facility for which an emissions rate has not been established by the Secretary, a taxpayer which owns such facility may file a petition with the Secretary for determination of the emissions rate with respect to such facility.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H1DE38037384A401FB2868983D8F26B3E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Carbon capture and sequestration equipment
                                    For purposes of this subsection, the amount of greenhouse gases emitted into the atmosphere by a facility in the production of electricity shall not include any qualified carbon dioxide that is captured by the taxpayer and—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HCCC4150E0A61493F9F4C7BE7583E2405"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       pursuant to any regulations established under paragraph (2) of section 45Q(f), disposed of by the taxpayer in secure geological storage, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5EEB1856B75A45228670D6AA68F84C5A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       utilized by the taxpayer in a manner described in paragraph (5) of such section.
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H5C476B54F5D748ECB19D096FC6DDF3A2"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Inflation adjustment
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H24BB588C4545425EA7F6F37AFBF126BC"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
