                                 In general
                                 In the case of a calendar year beginning after 2024, the 0.3 cent amount in paragraph (2)(A) of subsection (a) and the 1.5 cent amount in paragraph (2)(B) of such subsection shall each be adjusted by multiplying such amount by the inflation adjustment factor for the calendar year in which the sale, consumption, or storage of the electricity occurs. If the 0.3 cent amount as increased under this paragraph is not a multiple of 0.05 cent, such amount shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of 0.05 cent. If the 1.5 cent amount as increased under this paragraph is not a multiple of 0.1 cent, such amount shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of 0.1 cent.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HAEA9177B53194C53886BB3AFE44A1354"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Annual computation
                                 The Secretary shall, not later than April 1 of each calendar year, determine and publish in the Federal Register the inflation adjustment factor for such calendar year in accordance with this subsection.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H21B0BD662C82479EB7C62DA3922F0F66"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Inflation adjustment factor
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">inflation adjustment factor means, with respect to a calendar year, a fraction the numerator of which is the GDP implicit price deflator for the preceding calendar year and the denominator of which is the GDP implicit price deflator for the calendar year 1992. The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">GDP implicit price deflator means the most recent revision of the implicit price deflator for the gross domestic product as computed and published by the Department of Commerce before March 15 of the calendar year.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H07E9037CA9854AEAB716A068FB26E8DC"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Credit phase-out
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HBE384E5B2C034F99B12A4BAAD8DF7BE9"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 The amount of the clean electricity production credit under subsection (a) for any qualified facility the construction of which begins during a calendar year described in paragraph (2) shall be equal to the product of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H07AA693B2F52416FBB7B6B6E452D8F34"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the amount of the credit determined under subsection (a) without regard to this subsection, multiplied by
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H58932A45009F47BB9F1D466245BDE2E6"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the phase-out percentage under paragraph (2).
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HD6724706F7B0486AB14E83FE4201B001"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Phase-out percentage
                                 The phase-out percentage under this paragraph is equal to—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC91040060E484B848C6F6CD504281D67"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    for a facility the construction of which begins during the first calendar year following the applicable year, 100 percent,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC0658D72048E41098B4C5B6F7887865B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    for a facility the construction of which begins during the second calendar year following the applicable year, 75 percent,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3EDDAE1AC28C4285B7882D30F1CAD8DB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    for a facility the construction of which begins during the third calendar year following the applicable year, 50 percent, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H49EFDE6BFD0D4C8A89AC2323B15C39D3"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    for a facility the construction of which begins during any calendar year subsequent to the calendar year described in subparagraph (C), 0 percent.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H00A80EBF088944BB920CABFDD7A67906"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Applicable year
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">applicable year means the later of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9D076994EE9D4F829EC27EB7A1B30470"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the calendar year in which the Secretary determines that the annual greenhouse gas emissions from the production of electricity in the United States are equal to or less than 25 percent of the annual greenhouse gas emissions from the production of electricity in the United States for calendar year 2022, or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H64E58BB61E0D4C9E9B3EBC39C75F3F08"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    2032.
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HF58F171DD4B244BB91642CCCC33D6773"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              Definitions
                              For purposes of this section:
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF7138CD6E42A45748800D50352EEBA06"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 CO2e per KWh
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">CO2e per KWh means, with respect to any greenhouse gas, the equivalent carbon dioxide (as determined based on global warming potential) per kilowatt hour of electricity produced.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H747D057E671142C394C1095665624C7A"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Greenhouse gas
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">greenhouse gas has the same meaning given such term under section 211(o)(1)(G) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)(1)(G)), as in effect on the date of the enactment of this section.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H9CDB8C1BF99A454F99F94C560355E34B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Qualified carbon dioxide
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified carbon dioxide means carbon dioxide captured from an industrial source which—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H11B110AF89BB4A989B95C91F001BDD32"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    would otherwise be released into the atmosphere as industrial emission of greenhouse gas,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H89395A6333BB4742B9B3B0FDB3BDF476"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    is measured at the source of capture and verified at the point of disposal or utilization, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF06199E3BBDB40C3874C3DEE6BA37C35"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    is captured and disposed or utilized within the United States (within the meaning of section 638(1)) or a possession of the United States (within the meaning of section 638(2)).
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H0918E72E96544B4A858C97E669B80CFC"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Guidance
                              Not later than January 1, 2025, the Secretary shall issue guidance regarding implementation of this section, including calculation of greenhouse gas emission rates for qualified facilities and determination of clean electricity production credits under this section.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H382857C2F81C4D38B1B63C6D97536159"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (g)
                              Special rules
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H9E4E400FE8EB4FBAA2DE70F1BD274E21"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Only production in the United States taken into account
                                 Consumption, sales, or storage shall be taken into account under this section only with respect to electricity the production of which is within—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9050200E16EB4FD3B8BE5A57874534A9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the United States (within the meaning of section 638(1)), or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD75FB7554C334676B48628395A8350D4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    a possession of the United States (within the meaning of section 638(2)).
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HC3FD507DF3E649C684A7DF27C7C19873"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Combined heat and power system property
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HEDA6BF2EEA4A493BAB62FAF244F42901"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    For purposes of subsection (a)—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1FAEF8A7A73540E08EB586EB72AA6C0A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the kilowatt hours of electricity produced by a taxpayer at a qualified facility shall include any production in the form of useful thermal energy by any combined heat and power system property within such facility, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H734507D1059F43A69D55274E349EF29D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the amount of greenhouse gases emitted into the atmosphere by such facility in the production of such useful thermal energy shall be included for purposes of determining the greenhouse gas emissions rate for such facility.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HEC9B97F1891C4D499E98BCE9F18C0EAF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Combined heat and power system property
                                    For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">combined heat and power system property has the same meaning given such term by section 48(c)(3) (without regard to subparagraphs (A)(iv), (B), and (D) thereof).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8C332EB7D3BA4713964DF4C282D3461C"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Conversion from BTU to KWh
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H34B8F342DCA84CDAA015729FEF57DEE1"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       For purposes of subparagraph (A)(i), the amount of kilowatt hours of electricity produced in the form of useful thermal energy shall be equal to the quotient of—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HC3B78986994449849284A9707D92F47A"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          the total useful thermal energy produced by the combined heat and power system property within the qualified facility, divided by
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H63AE4A07E4184084B48FCF9AFFC5F837"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          the heat rate for such facility.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF9D856DAF7564CE5B2AAC1FC9B2F42B0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Heat rate
                                       For purposes of this subparagraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">heat rate means the amount of energy used by the qualified facility to generate 1 kilowatt hour of electricity, expressed as British thermal units per net kilowatt hour generated.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H367F11EC15AB4C7C9F174C8B58FFC2C4"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Production attributable to the taxpayer
                                 In the case of a qualified facility in which more than 1 person has an ownership interest, except to the extent provided in regulations prescribed by the Secretary, production from the facility shall be allocated among such persons in proportion to their respective ownership interests in the gross sales from such facility.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H66302974BD1E423BA38790C37D4BB3C6"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Related persons
                                 Persons shall be treated as related to each other if such persons would be treated as a single employer under the regulations prescribed under section 52(b). In the case of a corporation which is a member of an affiliated group of corporations filing a consolidated return, such corporation shall be treated as selling electricity to an unrelated person if such electricity is sold to such a person by another member of such group.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H26FD5A95EABE4F2E9D7356DB46E7C83D"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Pass-thru in the case of estates and trusts
                                 Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary, rules similar to the rules of subsection (d) of section 52 shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1FBB4036380942B99176FA2B99ECD599"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 Allocation of credit to patrons of agricultural cooperative
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H642A892A81B74AC6A57C490F24EE2F0A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Election to allocate
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7CB78F9374B245CDA82311DC38FE09CC"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       In the case of an eligible cooperative organization, any portion of the credit determined under subsection (a) for the taxable year may, at the election of the organization, be apportioned among patrons of the organization on the basis of the amount of business done by the patrons during the taxable year.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB2E4367566D74CBA910EAF045584B18B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Form and effect of election
                                       An election under clause (i) for any taxable year shall be made on a timely filed return for such year. Such election, once made, shall be irrevocable for such taxable year. Such election shall not take effect unless the organization designates the apportionment as such in a written notice mailed to its patrons during the payment period described in section 1382(d).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H447C60577F804E82809870E7AFA690CC"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Treatment of organizations and patrons
                                    The amount of the credit apportioned to any patrons under subparagraph (A)—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7E222F6A8FE84D4BB28712EDEB9A222B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       shall not be included in the amount determined under subsection (a) with respect to the organization for the taxable year, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H73B529F0A8524DF99FE73B3137FEA5C4"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       shall be included in the amount determined under subsection (a) for the first taxable year of each patron ending on or after the last day of the payment period (as defined in section 1382(d)) for the taxable year of the organization or, if earlier, for the taxable year of each patron ending on or after the date on which the patron receives notice from the cooperative of the apportionment.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA537A342FD664DCE954F318E37DBF4F1"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Special rules for decrease in credits for taxable year
                                    If the amount of the credit of a cooperative organization determined under subsection (a) for a taxable year is less than the amount of such credit shown on the return of the cooperative organization for such year, an amount equal to the excess of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBFC45551CFCC4C1199A5E5551029E70F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       such reduction, over
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC8967F05717748B7931A9478566B08B5"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the amount not apportioned to such patrons under subparagraph (A) for the taxable year,
                                    
                                    shall be treated as an increase in tax imposed by this chapter on the organization. Such increase shall not be treated as tax imposed by this chapter for purposes of determining the amount of any credit under this chapter. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD5B697EB839E4E01B816457583270A1D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Eligible cooperative defined
                                    For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">eligible cooperative means a cooperative organization described in section 1381(a) which is owned more than 50 percent by agricultural producers or by entities owned by agricultural producers. For this purpose an entity owned by an agricultural producer is one that is more than 50 percent owned by agricultural producers.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HDF58EC4B64B840838A2B1E2280172E83"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (7)
                                 Increase in credit in energy communities
                                 In the case of any qualified facility which is located in an energy community (as defined in section 45(b)(11)(B)), for purposes of determining the amount of the credit under subsection (a) with respect to any electricity produced by the taxpayer at such facility during the taxable year, the applicable amount under paragraph (2) of such subsection shall be increased by an amount equal to 10 percent of the amount otherwise in effect under such paragraph.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H5CDE1ABAEF89448BA56C41ED0A98EE50"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (8)
                                 Credit reduced for tax-exempt bonds
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(3) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA06D541E401C43208CEDE24409BF25B3"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (9)
                                 Wage requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(7) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6AD0E60D8C03452F809267C8D2D6B463"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (10)
                                 Apprenticeship requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(8) shall apply. 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H67ECAFCB56A34EABA55DB3AA48D97F64"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (11)
                                 Domestic content bonus credit amount
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H90CE30862451407BB167CAAE979D836D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    In the case of any qualified facility which satisfies the requirement under subparagraph (B)(i), the amount of the credit determined under subsection (a) shall be increased by an amount equal to 10 percent of the amount so determined (as determined without application of paragraph (7)).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC3E6E4ACD6EA4331B1E0A966DE44B7CD"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Requirement
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H34A7E419CB8A47EEA4A891D437E256EC"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       The requirement described in this subclause is satisfied with respect to any qualified facility if the taxpayer certifies to the Secretary (at such time, and in such form and manner, as the Secretary may prescribe) that any steel, iron, or manufactured product which is a component of such facility (upon completion of construction) was produced in the United States (as determined under section 661 of title 49, Code of Federal Regulations).
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6A7D50AC78774D3BB5BB83173936182A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Steel and iron
                                       In the case of steel or iron, clause (i) shall be applied in a manner consistent with section 661.5 of title 49, Code of Federal Regulations.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H182DBBF6E2954542BBB5421534EB7767"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Manufactured product
                                       For purposes of clause (i), the manufactured products which are components of a qualified facility upon completion of construction shall be deemed to have been produced in the United States if not less than the adjusted percentage (as determined under subparagraph (C)) of the total costs of all such manufactured products of such facility are attributable to manufactured products (including components) which are mined, produced, or manufactured in the United States.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H413A57F3C76140999FB8091E2728052D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Adjusted percentage
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H9E784FD1810345979F806A981ECF439F"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       Subject to subclause (ii), for purposes of subparagraph (B)(iii), the adjusted percentage shall be—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H2EAEBDD4365F4390A5EB1EDEE04E4260"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins before January 1, 2025, 40 percent,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H6E134912C08D47C0AF04070109814311"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2024, and before January 1, 2026, 45 percent,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H69A8866C32814A20B0712E8596170E1E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2025, and before January 1, 2027, 50 percent, and 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD9094DF78FDB44D18C0FA6DF460DE394"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (IV)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2026, 55 percent.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H13017654C92444A1AC5FD76E964F8F4B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Offshore wind facility
                                       For purposes of subparagraph (B)(iii), in the case of a qualified facility which is an offshore wind facility, the adjusted percentage shall be—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HC1D7929AD06645F9B019FB7B3F3774B9"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins before January 1, 2025, 20 percent,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H01B861C291D543A7B760A0F2D1C1F6EA"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2024, and before January 1, 2026, 27.5 percent,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H617CC634F15A43BCA3E25C3400831C07"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2025, and before January 1, 2027, 35 percent,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HB4E4A2FDBA5048E1B487A748C2DF5A99"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (IV)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2026, and before January 1, 2028, 45 percent, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H0025A543F8414F42AAE3B09467922D68"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (V)
                                          in the case of a facility the construction of which begins after December 31, 2027, 55 percent.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H930337778DAF46D7AFDF49D479EAF038"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (12)
                                 Phaseout for elective payment
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA30D9400D7C748828011F7AA3837CC61"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    In the case of a taxpayer making an election under section 6417 with respect to a credit under this section, the amount of such credit shall be replaced with—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1EE08046FAF0490B9788B0530BD0DA5C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the value of such credit (determined without regard to this paragraph), multiplied by
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB594C9411A4943968435AD5A229EBB0D"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the applicable percentage. 
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF8E8594576624155ADB9F26CF2328374"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    100 percent applicable percentage for certain qualified facilities
                                    In the case of any qualified facility—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA6C6D5B312F1495C9BF8AA971AF666BA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       which satisfies the requirements under paragraph (11)(B), or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF01D26E86BE640C4A367603BBB24F864"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       with a maximum net output of less than 1 megawatt (as measured in alternating current),
                                    
                                    the applicable percentage shall be 100 percent. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HABC776A8DCFD4EECA55870B9A8B9BB36"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Phased domestic content requirement
                                    Subject to subparagraph (D), in the case of any qualified facility which is not described in subparagraph (B), the applicable percentage shall be—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H67EC5669F59E444E98379C77A8AF5F30"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       if construction of such facility began before January 1, 2024, 100 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HFA984325BF7147FFB871044CDCBDA456"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       if construction of such facility began in calendar year 2024, 90 percent,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7645DE537419470490EDDEF4F9E2CC9A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       if construction of such facility began in calendar year 2025, 85 percent, and 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4F77F365A20743FE9AF2F805FCB65470"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       if construction of such facility began after December 31, 2025, 0 percent.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HFBD6906E145E44EDAEC5FAC7DE471AD2"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Exception
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H86FEC27A0F85487086C4DE4F0F95D4F8"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       For purposes of this paragraph, the Secretary shall provide exceptions to the requirements under this paragraph if—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HBE1F75CC596C448A923BD0B2E1388DBE"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          the inclusion of steel, iron, or manufactured products which are produced in the United States increases the overall costs of construction of qualified facilities by more than 25 percent, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H10B89A31799346A69B93CB639382DCB6"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          relevant steel, iron, or manufactured products are not produced in the United States in sufficient and reasonably available quantities or of a satisfactory quality.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6FFA6A0F932D4BBD89186D39545AD439"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Applicable percentage
                                       In any case in which the Secretary provides an exception pursuant to clause (i), the applicable percentage shall be 100 percent.
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H7EF2DEDD380445EF8190264AAF72AB2F"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (b)
                     Conforming amendments
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HF4B6A202F938479385FCEDD37672FE9D"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        Section 38(b), as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended—
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H73B5EDB7D9DE42D8B5F48310E6830DF6"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (A)
                           in paragraph (37), by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">plus at the end,
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="HA0EA901B4D6A497494B32DF1CFC909E7"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (B)
                           in paragraph (38), by striking the period at the end and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                      quote-display-start="auto"
                                      quote-type="text">, plus, and
                        
                        <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       id="H78BEFE8A142946D4B6BAAA95A5982857"
                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                           (C)
                           by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
                           <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                          display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          display-quotes="yes"
                                          id="HFAA8FB5779AD4FF9ACABF893C3798F34"
                                          style="OLC">
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HCFF83ECA045849DDBFEA4FEC1F56F979"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (39)
                                 the clean electricity production credit determined under section 45Y(a).
                              
                              .
                           
                        
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H3D41BFAED68D41E18D1D4BBA0612B438"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        The table of sections for subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new item:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H35A09633916940FA8242C496853A479B"
                                       style="OLC">
                           
                              Sec. 45Y. Clean electricity production credit.
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HD23C579A7519407BBAE441BC99B113DE"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (c)
                     Effective date
                     The amendments made by this section shall apply to facilities placed in service after December 31, 2024.
                  
               
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="HB18DB26FD8B94C3B8097F99048FAB228"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13702.
                  CLEAN ELECTRICITY INVESTMENT CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H99AADFCC1F604ADCAA54021DE2EF49EF"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart E of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by section 107(a) of the CHIPS Act of 2022, is amended by inserting after section 48D the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H28C722B74240436EA124A3963F4439D1"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="H33420790FA5F4028850740BBCBDC1CCE"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           48E.
                           CLEAN ELECTRICITY INVESTMENT CREDIT
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H5A84D82C9222421E8CD6DDBC1F6C795D"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              Investment credit for qualified property
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H7DAD1C369553469587C73B4C14EF0B8E"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 For purposes of section 46, the clean electricity investment credit for any taxable year is an amount equal to the applicable percentage of the qualified investment for such taxable year with respect to—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE834A2F31F4646E081E8B8F4DA3515CF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    any qualified facility, and 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD4E331FAC6FB40FDBAB038A90D2A54B0"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    any energy storage technology.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HE62A6102C64D4C51A4EF0344756DAD1A"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Applicable percentage
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE6FA57CE25AE4ADAACBF3976C0B34DEF"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Qualified facilities
                                    Subject to paragraph (3)—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2C0B57ED23374089B144F67B0B21E2C5"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Base rate
                                       In the case of any qualified facility which is not described in subclause (I) or (II) of clause (ii) and does not satisfy the requirements described in subclause (III) of such clause, the applicable percentage shall be 6 percent.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H325172141F1445289955E67477BA78B2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Alternative rate
                                       In the case of any qualified facility—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HAAE14D05CE314DAAB95D308BF5D9FCFA"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          with a maximum net output of less than 1 megawatt (as measured in alternating current), 
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD103A43F54584E17BDFDB2B763A83D1D"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          the construction of which begins prior to the date that is 60 days after the Secretary publishes guidance with respect to the requirements of paragraphs (3) and (4) of subsection (d), or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H1E24D39EE4884C8B8FBFECE1DD6680C1"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          which—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H0FC7952BE4F94B5EA4BCABD1777838DF"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             satisfies the requirements of subsection (d)(3), and
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H4FA0ADE5D9F84DE082EEDE697E62157E"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             with respect to the construction of such facility, satisfies the requirements of subsection (d)(4), 
                                          
                                       
                                       the applicable percentage shall be 30 percent. 
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H257D081C2D4D4A158AFE528663DC3600"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Energy storage technology
                                    Subject to paragraph (3)—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H0C71C2330F70445B9C7C09DBC722E3F6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Base rate
                                       In the case of any energy storage technology which is not described in subclause (I) or (II) of clause (ii) and does not satisfy the requirements described in subclause (III) of such clause, the applicable percentage shall be 6 percent.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD671F53BC4754FCB90743EAAF0634BA1"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Alternative rate
                                       In the case of any energy storage technology—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H0929432F21304411AFCBC73388BF710E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          with a capacity of less than 1 megawatt,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HC10EA8CCA6614CE7BF0CB294DA3DAC79"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          the construction of which begins prior to the date that is 60 days after the Secretary publishes guidance with respect to the requirements of paragraphs (3) and (4) of subsection (d), or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H35CB45DE76DF488E96D4F60CE35D03F2"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          which—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HB2226E8E64F54C22857CE641FE59D3E8"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             satisfies the requirements of subsection (d)(3), and
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HF9A9AD77AE4D494087DD86B8D248583A"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             with respect to the construction of such property, satisfies the requirements of subsection (d)(4), 
                                          
                                       
                                       the applicable percentage shall be 30 percent. 
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1D5D7C4D552F4A339608E434FFD0EC95"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Increase in credit rate in certain cases
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H53CC5B1EA91A4EAAB16608F94DD1B3E6"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Energy communities
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBD5EA5DE9AA44E3A8FA66C2AB06248DF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       In the case of any qualified investment with respect to a qualified facility or with respect to energy storage technology which is placed in service within an energy community (as defined in section 45(b)(11)(B)), for purposes of applying paragraph (2) with respect to such property or investment, the applicable percentage shall be increased by the applicable credit rate increase.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC4469057E0BD4EA19E5C630C2EF51F3E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Applicable credit rate increase
                                       For purposes of clause (i), the applicable credit rate increase shall be an amount equal to—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HD25FCED2D89644C6BD3E587DA1DB04D3"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in the case of any qualified investment with respect to a qualified facility described in paragraph (2)(A)(i) or with respect to energy storage technology described in paragraph (2)(B)(i), 2 percentage points, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H0D67606B008A4FAF8426049D3876FB81"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in the case of any qualified investment with respect to a qualified facility described in paragraph (2)(A)(ii) or with respect to energy storage technology described in paragraph (2)(B)(ii), 10 percentage points.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H0AC457FB49BA4FCF9512CA2DAAC68372"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Domestic content
                                    Rules similar to the rules of section 48(a)(12) shall apply. 
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H960A2EFBA8F740638047F8AF9C128AB2"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Qualified investment with respect to a qualified facility
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H79A59152C2E14C988B7E2FFAE27C6E4C"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 For purposes of subsection (a), the qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility for any taxable year is the sum of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H737D8F0F110A4823A6629A3A5A9FFDA8"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the basis of any qualified property placed in service by the taxpayer during such taxable year which is part of a qualified facility, plus
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6F55952150F84FC3B0B2DDC7C74A0DE3"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the amount of any expenditures which are—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3FE95BC650744C4A9E47A223A1F94D8E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       paid or incurred by the taxpayer for qualified interconnection property—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H112FC889E57044B3980CD3112E90224D"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in connection with a qualified facility which has a maximum net output of not greater than 5 megawatts (as measured in alternating current), and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HB045EB2B05C54ACD8742374AC24B6F9E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          placed in service during the taxable year of the taxpayer, and
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD05CB8E516CE4E9B837DBBB3313D5304"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       properly chargeable to capital account of the taxpayer.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA01BFE1A6AC1497E8C350320D91DC571"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Qualified property
                                 For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified property means property—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6787F7117EB3480FA1FFA6EFB9335098"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H1922575271F94C23B0C938CACBA82522"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       tangible personal property, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC83E88135A4C419BAA111748DCF1E1CB"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       other tangible property (not including a building or its structural components), but only if such property is used as an integral part of the qualified facility,
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6F30060C54094014B37CEF688B9B336B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    with respect to which depreciation (or amortization in lieu of depreciation) is allowable, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H83040716C9FB42D5BD7727595170A96E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H19A688E5D1DB4B05B0D02DBD86149E30"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the construction, reconstruction, or erection of which is completed by the taxpayer, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB435ABF761DE4E7DBAE02C3AC56B10C9"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       which is acquired by the taxpayer if the original use of such property commences with the taxpayer.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H38455EE9DE67499C8491E3DE8470D341"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Qualified facility
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H3BC4C410254C4602B414712BF1529728"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualified facility means a facility—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8DAC5AE91A5544AA83F161BB1339E6F9"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       which is used for the generation of electricity,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF23E0EF9C1F74CA3A683A955A0A619D7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       which is placed in service after December 31, 2024, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H968336BAEBB04F0DAB81060B7C50CDCA"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       for which the anticipated greenhouse gas emissions rate (as determined under subparagraph (B)(ii)) is not greater than zero.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8C7D12481D914DEDBBB31431F31C06A8"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Additional rules
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H0DBE7F93C716480DBE2BE001705700B3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Expansion of facility; incremental production
                                       Rules similar to the rules of section 45Y(b)(1)(C) shall apply for purposes of this paragraph.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H80B8544F6CF5461280B92DE04E956CFD"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Greenhouse gas emissions rate
                                       Rules similar to the rules of section 45Y(b)(2) shall apply for purposes of this paragraph.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD5B4B56C01E04F67B1D3E81E9B4AC7AE"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Exclusion
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">qualified facility shall not include any facility for which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA458C743A16447B38E0C11762FBF7BB3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       a renewable electricity production credit determined under section 45, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC4039450CC174A2A91E9F326660F1BF2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       an advanced nuclear power facility production credit determined under section 45J, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
