                                             id="H3B61A966D5A1467AA7834499602A7500"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       a carbon oxide sequestration credit determined under section 45Q,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2D66A932C0704EE28C330A08BA85D75B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       a zero-emission nuclear power production credit determined under section 45U,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD62F1C77CCD74977A602B5E3C3CD2F67"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       a clean electricity production credit determined under section 45Y,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBD2BD8A980024EC38AD5C25339110E01"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vi)
                                       an energy credit determined under section 48, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HEF24BDD2609540629AE2583EEB9919E5"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vii)
                                       a qualifying advanced coal project credit under section 48A,
                                    
                                    is allowed under section 38 for the taxable year or any prior taxable year. 
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3F19FA3AD0B44AC38C37C58D231E3527"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Qualified interconnection property
                                 For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified interconnection property has the meaning given such term in section 48(a)(8)(B). 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H9C43ECDD3EF749E7B2D7470F03EE5817"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Coordination with rehabilitation credit
                                 The qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility for any taxable year shall not include that portion of the basis of any property which is attributable to qualified rehabilitation expenditures (as defined in section 47(c)(2)).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H50691831CA064EEABCA9D6A109E64081"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 Definitions
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the terms <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">CO2e per KWh and <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">greenhouse gas emissions rate have the same meaning given such terms under section 45Y. 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HCD2CE2F6CBB245A78966F587B72366A6"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Qualified investment with respect to energy storage technology
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H830B569A0E5C4EC99FB9B2622F74D6D7"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Qualified investment
                                 For purposes of subsection (a), the qualified investment with respect to energy storage technology for any taxable year is the basis of any energy storage technology placed in service by the taxpayer during such taxable year.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1796178A86DC49BC920C7A6015B1BF93"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Energy storage technology
                                 For purposes of this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">energy storage technology has the meaning given such term in section 48(c)(6) (except that subparagraph (D) of such section shall not apply).
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H928F77A7A63B44EE91B87AAB6414AE1C"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Special rules
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4DD4B09F7FA940A4B413494F49BD0DF7"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Certain progress expenditure rules made applicable
                                 Rules similar to the rules of subsections (c)(4) and (d) of section 46 (as in effect on the day before the date of the enactment of the Revenue Reconciliation Act of 1990) shall apply for purposes of subsection (a).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HE5D87AB6244A4731BB764E9F15494DD9"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Special rule for property financed by subsidized energy financing or private activity bonds
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(3) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H81D2D843FFF4408F860E65792321340C"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Prevailing wage requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 48(a)(10) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0E36B22F0C774C70AC6D3AF851848DD1"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Apprenticeship requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(8) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H76B0336CF5324D35B6D2065A439AD4C8"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Domestic content requirement for elective payment
                                 In the case of a taxpayer making an election under section 6417 with respect to a credit under this section, rules similar to the rules of section 45Y(g)(12) shall apply. 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H93936A1F37E5450289C430E6873618F5"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              Credit phase-Out
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HFB0B1FBE9CC04D439C6E9156170789B5"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 The amount of the clean electricity investment credit under subsection (a) for any qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility or energy storage technology the construction of which begins during a calendar year described in paragraph (2) shall be equal to the product of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H23049A1271C14D1E87ACE23EADC2E2F9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the amount of the credit determined under subsection (a) without regard to this subsection, multiplied by
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8F070B84A0BD4891A9EFA5965EBFAC2B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the phase-out percentage under paragraph (2).
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H32BAAD9D8C954E5A8556485ACA7554DD"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Phase-out percentage
                                 The phase-out percentage under this paragraph is equal to—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H4754FB6D59EB4120B5D40F0B05E88914"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    for any qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility or energy storage technology the construction of which begins during the first calendar year following the applicable year, 100 percent,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB5523258859A4A67AAE339CE498F392A"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    for any qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility or energy storage technology the construction of which begins during the second calendar year following the applicable year, 75 percent,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H060A3DA7F8234518B5B2ACBF42102932"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    for any qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility or energy storage technology the construction of which begins during the third calendar year following the applicable year, 50 percent, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H5C217C09B7694BF7A17F4BD9F71CEDFB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    for any qualified investment with respect to any qualified facility or energy storage technology the construction of which begins during any calendar year subsequent to the calendar year described in subparagraph (C), 0 percent.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1EFFC946D990442F978ADCE3C5FF6E35"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Applicable year
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">applicable year has the same meaning given such term in section 45Y(d)(3).
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H98AA4E98D8DE40CBB88BDAFD41C3D333"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Greenhouse gas
                              In this section, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">greenhouse gas has the same meaning given such term under section 45Y(e)(2).
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HD7C7838D78A448A3BA8D1E608BC004F8"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (g)
                              Recapture of credit
                              For purposes of section 50, if the Secretary determines that the greenhouse gas emissions rate for a qualified facility is greater than 10 grams of CO2e per KWh, any property for which a credit was allowed under this section with respect to such facility shall cease to be investment credit property in the taxable year in which the determination is made.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H451B3E57D8084899830A6BFB721D9806"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (h)
                              Special rules for certain facilities placed in service in connection with low-income communities
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H5B35A539ED3E43528A50F7052987E3CF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 In the case of any applicable facility with respect to which the Secretary makes an allocation of environmental justice capacity limitation under paragraph (4)—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF56BA25490A64F0E8CD2E932445FFFC1"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the applicable percentage otherwise determined under subsection (a)(2) with respect to any eligible property which is part of such facility shall be increased by—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H26D6A7C2516A4330A27A5FD1FE86CDE0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of a facility described in subclause (I) of paragraph (2)(A)(iii) and not described in subclause (II) of such paragraph, 10 percentage points, and 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HDDE5CD614C8B41B8AF3CAC3E5F557067"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of a facility described in subclause (II) of paragraph (2)(A)(iii), 20 percentage points, and
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H94FAB1ADB68D400484D5505A13581B36"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the increase in the credit determined under subsection (a) by reason of this subsection for any taxable year with respect to all property which is part of such facility shall not exceed the amount which bears the same ratio to the amount of such increase (determined without regard to this subparagraph) as—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H350C2E337A784C9E93326751BAF49575"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the environmental justice capacity limitation allocated to such facility, bears to
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB0C08390675D4FB69598EB2B7BD70BAB"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the total megawatt nameplate capacity of such facility, as measured in direct current.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H8BF9E36EC4294B27BFE00C85EA9AAF98"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Applicable facility
                                 For purposes of this subsection—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H5DCCFC47207A4D908FB5F518F314B161"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">applicable facility means any qualified facility—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC0E7F79AFF8843C1ADE9DD8543EACE67"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       which is not described in section 45Y(b)(2)(B), 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7BF251BA7B8F46B49F56AE67ECE664AF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       which has a maximum net output of less than 5 megawatts (as measured in alternating current), and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H90005411C22F464683BB07C09317FC72"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       which—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H2128BC4BE6A84A4687C651C0E91E7F8D"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          is located in a low-income community (as defined in section 45D(e)) or on Indian land (as defined in section 2601(2) of the Energy Policy Act of 1992 (25 U.S.C. 3501(2))), or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H448F3BE741B8473D880BB64C5EE310D9"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          is part of a qualified low-income residential building project or a qualified low-income economic benefit project.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H81BD2D9AE7B2437593E6D7F55BC42613"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Qualified low-income residential building project
                                    A facility shall be treated as part of a qualified low-income residential building project if—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H0434388BD1734F3CA7F110A3CFE98FDE"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       such facility is installed on a residential rental building which participates in a covered housing program (as defined in section 41411(a) of the Violence Against Women Act of 1994 (34 U.S.C. 12491(a)(3)), a housing assistance program administered by the Department of Agriculture under title V of the Housing Act of 1949, a housing program administered by a tribally designated housing entity (as defined in section 4(22) of the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 (25 U.S.C. 4103(22))) or such other affordable housing programs as the Secretary may provide, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H459A7058601241B0BEFE9D2D8B09588B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       the financial benefits of the electricity produced by such facility are allocated equitably among the occupants of the dwelling units of such building.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H96B2712CCE0447069052D32F0916E020"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Qualified low-income economic benefit project
                                    A facility shall be treated as part of a qualified low-income economic benefit project if at least 50 percent of the financial benefits of the electricity produced by such facility are provided to households with income of—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H100F74F8CC9941E59E38F129738FEC59"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       less than 200 percent of the poverty line (as defined in section 36B(d)(3)(A)) applicable to a family of the size involved, or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HD1F4AF4D9A2B4A76836338D547C09CFF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       less than 80 percent of area median gross income (as determined under section 142(d)(2)(B)). 
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HBE5229CC123E4B0C8ADC99AAB868153F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Financial benefit
                                    For purposes of subparagraphs (B) and (C), electricity acquired at a below-market rate shall not fail to be taken into account as a financial benefit.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HD028D19AB8244D6C88B15E592AC10AEA"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Eligible property
                                 For purposes of this subsection, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">eligible property means a qualified investment with respect to any applicable facility.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2A279177755648958000D005FDF71CA8"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Allocations
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H274863C6D9C0472E8B1C86ED518043A1"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    Not later than January 1, 2025, the Secretary shall establish a program to allocate amounts of environmental justice capacity limitation to applicable facilities. In establishing such program and to carry out the purposes of this subsection, the Secretary shall provide procedures to allow for an efficient allocation process, including, when determined appropriate, consideration of multiple projects in a single application if such projects will be placed in service by a single taxpayer. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE57299846F5F4C5AB8024302E010B65E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Limitation
                                    The amount of environmental justice capacity limitation allocated by the Secretary under subparagraph (A) during any calendar year shall not exceed the annual capacity limitation with respect to such year. 
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC9AE4C9AA8664EBA977EB671F19FF358"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Annual capacity limitation
                                    For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">annual capacity limitation means 1.8 gigawatts of direct current capacity for each calendar year during the period beginning on January 1, 2025, and ending on December 31 of the applicable year (as defined in section 45Y(d)(3)), and zero thereafter.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H84D03248ED2C418C89F8E3C91111C5C1"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Carryover of unused limitation
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H756BCFA4AD8544A490FF4D5B92884E31"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       If the annual capacity limitation for any calendar year exceeds the aggregate amount allocated for such year under this paragraph, such limitation for the succeeding calendar year shall be increased by the amount of such excess. No amount may be carried under the preceding sentence to any calendar year after the third calendar year following the applicable year (as defined in section 45Y(d)(3)).
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H07CE6728CFA0463A9B651599A3C1E7C1"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Carryover from section 48 for calendar year 2025
                                       If the annual capacity limitation for calendar year 2024 under section 48(e)(4)(D) exceeds the aggregate amount allocated for such year under such section, such excess amount may be carried over and applied to the annual capacity limitation under this subsection for calendar year 2025. The annual capacity limitation for calendar year 2025 shall be increased by the amount of such excess.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H60CD6A040FF34A238AB1500C4C4F96A4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (E)
                                    Placed in service deadline
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8A2435A144754F29AF7D45D0A569F143"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       Paragraph (1) shall not apply with respect to any property which is placed in service after the date that is 4 years after the date of the allocation with respect to the facility of which such property is a part.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HAD49FCE8168E40199885C8624987D3D6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Application of carryover
                                       Any amount of environmental justice capacity limitation which expires under clause (i) during any calendar year shall be taken into account as an excess described in subparagraph (D)(i) (or as an increase in such excess) for such calendar year, subject to the limitation imposed by the last sentence of such subparagraph.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HAFC4876325A04539A79E975C5F22EAD1"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Recapture
                                 The Secretary shall, by regulations or other guidance, provide for recapturing the benefit of any increase in the credit allowed under subsection (a) by reason of this subsection with respect to any property which ceases to be property eligible for such increase (but which does not cease to be investment credit property within the meaning of section 50(a)). The period and percentage of such recapture shall be determined under rules similar to the rules of section 50(a). To the extent provided by the Secretary, such recapture may not apply with respect to any property if, within 12 months after the date the taxpayer becomes aware (or reasonably should have become aware) of such property ceasing to be property eligible for such increase, the eligibility of such property for such increase is restored. The preceding sentence shall not apply more than once with respect to any facility. 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H21DB7AF6E1A945F09B90D0BA5A72AF48"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (i)
                              Guidance
                              Not later than January 1, 2025, the Secretary shall issue guidance regarding implementation of this section.
                           
                        
                        .
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H93D19CE325BF481FB07A3E27E1BC738F"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">

               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H2823674976824B61A3348DADC57B9CD3"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13703.
                  COST RECOVERY FOR QUALIFIED FACILITIES, QUALIFIED PROPERTY, AND ENERGY STORAGE TECHNOLOGY
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HD26897CC69C0451BAA6182B263993E09"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     
                        Section 168(e)(3)(B) is amended—
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H1164C033A97C4399B93AA82CC5FB4952"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (1)
                        in clause (vi)(III), by striking <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">and at the end,
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="HA8CC790FF10342A3AE087942D547DAAF"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (2)
                        in clause (vii), by striking the period at the end and inserting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                   quote-display-start="auto"
                                   quote-type="text">, and, and
                     
                     <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                 id="H3A0E85F4C8B344A59DB64CF41426AC00"
                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                        (3)
                        by inserting after clause (vii) the following:
                        <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                       display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                       display-quotes="yes"
                                       id="H6E47794F66904276A95A8D8F1C7C346D"
                                       style="OLC">
                           <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    id="H1D10E4AFB4E64C06B73E1926C19BA13C"
                                    qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (viii)
                              any qualified facility (as defined in section 45Y(b)(1)(A)), any qualified property (as defined in subsection (b)(2) of section 48E) which is a qualified investment (as defined in subsection (b)(1) of such section), or any energy storage technology (as defined in subsection (c)(2) of such section).
                           
                           .
                        
                     
                  
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H0F2DAFA421434FDB9CFA6FE116E27A8E"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (b)
                     Effective date
