               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H8E1A6747E21F402BAD3FFAECBCAF227A"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13704.
                  CLEAN FUEL PRODUCTION CREDIT
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="HDFC34F2DE11243DABE34799222B44E3B"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subpart D of part IV of subchapter A of chapter 1, as amended by the preceding provisions of this Act, is amended by adding at the end the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="HFE8BB5C7309A47F786C99BC83C25F601"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="HA806B031E21D4A3281D6C86D7E6CC1A6"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           45Z.
                           CLEAN FUEL PRODUCTION CREDIT
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HF0B088B462D54812B48C17343EC879A2"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              Amount of credit
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4D13727569814A068CB4D6B82E86E968"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 For purposes of section 38, the clean fuel production credit for any taxable year is an amount equal to the product of—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H79DF5CF3C49844979B79FD120EF384D9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the applicable amount per gallon (or gallon equivalent) with respect to any transportation fuel which is—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H4E4058307A864FA287A51E0DAD480232"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       produced by the taxpayer at a qualified facility, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5A643AA1E1B24E8E8606968441ED6FB6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       sold by the taxpayer in a manner described in paragraph (4) during the taxable year, and
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9CA6727C84B1460AA73FB5346369B8CE"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    the emissions factor for such fuel (as determined under subsection (b)).
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF3312644F0024E25A4A371AF59AE65DD"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Applicable amount
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC47ADF2BB82543639A647278E4ED1DD3"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Base amount
                                    In the case of any transportation fuel produced at a qualified facility which does not satisfy the requirements described in subparagraph (B), the applicable amount shall be 20 cents.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H73B9B76E3E824A47967D759206992671"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Alternative amount
                                    In the case of any transportation fuel produced at a qualified facility which satisfies the requirements under paragraphs (6) and (7) of subsection (f), the applicable amount shall be $1.00. 
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1F49E4FEC20F4F2DBB2986BB1342608D"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Special rate for sustainable aviation fuel
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H00FA1D6F2D244965897BE601C845C866"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    In the case of a transportation fuel which is sustainable aviation fuel, paragraph (2) shall be applied—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H9C0CB70BC9584CB6BFAC808557DDDBFC"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       in the case of fuel produced at a qualified facility described in paragraph (2)(A), by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">35 cents for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">20 cents, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2F8529D5AB9E42C585AC38FA7269F47B"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       in the case of fuel produced at a qualified facility described in paragraph (2)(B), by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">$1.75 for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">$1.00.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB7EBB414B4DE4DF4A0DC65E9239951D2"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Sustainable aviation fuel
                                    For purposes of this subparagraph (A), the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">sustainable aviation fuel means liquid fuel, the portion of which is not kerosene, which is sold for use in an aircraft and which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H860FDF27ADA4458E8A5C5CFE198C4C32"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       meets the requirements of—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HC10CEE09DA03411AB0297F789F034BA7"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          ASTM International Standard D7566, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H17A7662B6BE348F2BF4CCAC48F4B9C17"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          the Fischer Tropsch provisions of ASTM International Standard D1655, Annex A1, and
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6DEFAF47D4E84D3096B4C8F1BA4F24C4"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       is not derived from palm fatty acid distillates or petroleum.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB1C841958E044CD2ABDBCCE96D4188E7"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Sale
                                 For purposes of paragraph (1), the transportation fuel is sold in a manner described in this paragraph if such fuel is sold by the taxpayer to an unrelated person—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H5D2C49E9B218460998A08EA45B42EB74"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    for use by such person in the production of a fuel mixture,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H08215FD7A2FE4143863C34DBCD97F90F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    for use by such person in a trade or business, or
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H14F8CD9174F545AD833CD065B76FA4AB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    who sells such fuel at retail to another person and places such fuel in the fuel tank of such other person.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF01A2518218546B1AE500D9232C9396B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Rounding
                                 If any amount determined under paragraph (1) is not a multiple of 1 cent, such amount shall be rounded to the nearest cent.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H6AA700F318F34922955739E58B428D13"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Emissions factors
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H73092BA93A774E169F6997637888CB16"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Emissions factor
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HC166F5D656DD4A3DBDCE8A43B11977AE"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    Calculation
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF746CF2239E44FC69FC7E3C32DEDDC91"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       The emissions factor of a transportation fuel shall be an amount equal to the quotient of—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H158EAE32ADE942FBA188F4843FB2C7EF"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          an amount equal to—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H88355779F19243EE9D03A248A91F2AC8"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             50 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU, minus
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HA4667851F4A2414391CFD6BF1F9F70C3"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             the emissions rate for such fuel, divided by
                                          
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H2F9DF52CF90B4267B5768F544A8C4E1F"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          50 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HF311F304A9854DB289F530345880A4D2"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Establishment of emissions rate
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HF4B6271A8EC04006B97128C38514481C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       Subject to clauses (ii) and (iii), the Secretary shall annually publish a table which sets forth the emissions rate for similar types and categories of transportation fuels based on the amount of lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions (as described in section 211(o)(1)(H) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)(1)(H)), as in effect on the date of the enactment of this section) for such fuels, expressed as kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU, which a taxpayer shall use for purposes of this section.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2DAF76D5A80B447A8C3F97F04F725B14"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Non-aviation fuel
                                       In the case of any transportation fuel which is not a sustainable aviation fuel, the lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions of such fuel shall be based on the most recent determinations under the Greenhouse gases, Regulated Emissions, and Energy use in Transportation model developed by Argonne National Laboratory, or a successor model (as determined by the Secretary).
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H7D5CBCD06925414D92C096ACF622B4BE"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Aviation fuel
                                       In the case of any transportation fuel which is a sustainable aviation fuel, the lifecycle greenhouse gas emissions of such fuel shall be determined in accordance with—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H740EB970FC98409F850707D525786539"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          the most recent Carbon Offsetting and Reduction Scheme for International Aviation which has been adopted by the International Civil Aviation Organization with the agreement of the United States, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H29B356BC24A442DE9A8ED7CD2A49B86F"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          any similar methodology which satisfies the criteria under section 211(o)(1)(H) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)(1)(H)), as in effect on the date of enactment of this section.
                                       
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE6695708A50F4430A21266271A8F1E06"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Rounding of emissions rate
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3939CC04133D4EDABD8FF24721F402E8"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       Subject to clause (ii), the Secretary may round the emissions rates under subparagraph (B) to the nearest multiple of 5 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H734953D910F7448C88D4465B0E17EA62"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Exception
                                       In the case of an emissions rate that is between 2.5 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU and -2.5 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU, the Secretary may round such rate to zero.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE1DC916D8B6D4EE2A1C7AB911FDE8B30"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Provisional emissions rate
                                    In the case of any transportation fuel for which an emissions rate has not been established under subparagraph (B), a taxpayer producing such fuel may file a petition with the Secretary for determination of the emissions rate with respect to such fuel.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H48902CDA4FF0415FBE6CB35F3B5B618F"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Rounding
                                 If any amount determined under paragraph (1)(A) is not a multiple of 0.1, such amount shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of 0.1.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H1F26076F97E748BB9D49A79A059EB1DF"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Inflation adjustment
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA3DF22C96A5D432799E6CEC5766D1D15"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 In the case of calendar years beginning after 2024, the 20 cent amount in subsection (a)(2)(A), the $1.00 amount in subsection (a)(2)(B), the 35 cent amount in subsection (a)(3)(A)(i), and the $1.75 amount in subsection (a)(3)(A)(ii) shall each be adjusted by multiplying such amount by the inflation adjustment factor for the calendar year in which the sale of the transportation fuel occurs. If any amount as increased under the preceding sentence is not a multiple of 1 cent, such amount shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of 1 cent.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6CDAFD8E4B8D40D18EB95074E893A8E7"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Inflation adjustment factor
                                 For purposes of paragraph (1), the inflation adjustment factor shall be the inflation adjustment factor determined and published by the Secretary pursuant to section 45Y(c), determined by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">calendar year 2022 for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">calendar year 1992 in paragraph (3) thereof.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HFAA19F1DA2F547938305C1CD276F7C36"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Definitions
                              In this section:
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HEDC8D323239A4F4EA429817C68997324"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 mmBTU
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">mmBTU means 1,000,000 British thermal units.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4D342FD5DDF640AE9DAFD68C30502D30"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 CO2e
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">CO2e means, with respect to any greenhouse gas, the equivalent carbon dioxide (as determined based on relative global warming potential).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HEA04A7669C4349F3A78C3C522BB47CF3"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Greenhouse gas
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">greenhouse gas has the same meaning given that term under section 211(o)(1)(G) of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7545(o)(1)(G)), as in effect on the date of the enactment of this section.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H75BA62F0B20444E58C7BBF2151525FAF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Qualified facility
                                 The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                            quote-display-start="auto"
                                            quote-type="text">qualified facility—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H5D137DBFB7C6425991AB3C5682628790"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    means a facility used for the production of transportation fuels, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H6677147438E04D1B9878B630E18C8262"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    does not include any facility for which one of the following credits is allowed under section 38 for the taxable year: 
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H6964437145E04014BB3659CAAA66893C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       The credit for production of clean hydrogen under section 45V.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5E6515D5DA0F4857BDB5356C3B0C7CE2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       The credit determined under section 46 to the extent that such credit is attributable to the energy credit determined under section 48 with respect to any specified clean hydrogen production facility for which an election is made under subsection (a)(15) of such section.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HAD14E40BD3B7482AA5BD37A4EC494C3A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       The credit for carbon oxide sequestration under section 45Q. 
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HA276ED8A655C4398987D7CCFCC615637"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Transportation fuel
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HE58F9D3E121D488E80F9E2ADCD2B3EA4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">transportation fuel means a fuel which—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H5ABFA65ADE1744F692AD21F52E93F819"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       is suitable for use as a fuel in a highway vehicle or aircraft, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H2EB683BA508B4A06A2E00DE020BABDE7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       has an emissions rate which is not greater than 50 kilograms of CO2e per mmBTU, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H079F048152A849E3BC20D2D9CDEFCDB7"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       is not derived from coprocessing an applicable material (or materials derived from an applicable material) with a feedstock which is not biomass.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HCD7965B79C8642DBB234A0370A61C293"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Definitions
                                    In this paragraph—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H88EB9E8DC9A44BB08126BBEEE5338267"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Applicable material
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">applicable material means—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HCA5767A74746433386699AE2F0157E6E"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          monoglycerides, diglycerides, and triglycerides,
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H3D2C8DCAA7AB4C4EA96A9F4F09926F53"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          free fatty acids, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H567B6A323DCB426E9FE669D9F6745619"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (III)
                                          fatty acid esters.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8FAE0B1D266C4781A6D8A2C2B8A4D243"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Biomass
                                       The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">biomass has the same meaning given such term in section 45K(c)(3).
                                    
                                 
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H30E9A7192B8C42D8B3F7DE4CDEA0870E"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (e)
                              Guidance
                              Not later than January 1, 2025, the Secretary shall issue guidance regarding implementation of this section, including calculation of emissions factors for transportation fuel, the table described in subsection (b)(1)(B)(i), and the determination of clean fuel production credits under this section.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HFD2EAD6C24A545558E82CCA5685669F3"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (f)
                              Special rules
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H67F5D5A875694207BA8F444879A76DCF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Only registered production in the United States taken into account
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H0F6F969C9C3D448BBA9B5B5851E6126F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    No clean fuel production credit shall be determined under subsection (a) with respect to any transportation fuel unless—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3F77D685B7DE41BC8A40EAE450332279"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       the taxpayer—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H46D47D8E08F741F38BFBFEC5482A3FA5"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          is registered as a producer of clean fuel under section 4101 at the time of production, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HECBC1BBB553F4AE38FA923662E2E3296"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in the case of any transportation fuel which is a sustainable aviation fuel, provides—
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="HBEDE90670DB84161BAD318F3CE83FF53"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             certification (in such form and manner as the Secretary shall prescribe) from an unrelated party demonstrating compliance with—
                                             <subitem display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                       id="H469BD425530340E3A70BD4B6DC128A88"
                                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                                (AA)
                                                any general requirements, supply chain traceability requirements, and information transmission requirements established under the Carbon Offsetting and Reduction Scheme for International Aviation described in subclause (I) of subsection (b)(1)(B)(iii), or 
                                             
                                             <subitem display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                       id="HC65711F026874A669C9CBF5E92033530"
                                                       qb-display-quote="yes">
                                                (BB)
                                                in the case of any methodology described in subclause (II) of such subsection, requirements similar to the requirements described in subitem (AA), and
                                             
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H5FCFD8540E1D4463B2D31B74F92D94AF"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (bb)
                                             such other information with respect to such fuel as the Secretary may require for purposes of carrying out this section, and
                                          
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H8B7453FFF43C4A008DDEE457CB9421CF"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       such fuel is produced in the United States.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H803E89DB6B0042039528414CB421AA6F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    United States
                                    For purposes of this paragraph, the term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">United States includes any possession of the United States.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H3488DA6A391F4A23B967D0ADD24132E9"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Production attributable to the taxpayer
                                 In the case of a facility in which more than 1 person has an ownership interest, except to the extent provided in regulations prescribed by the Secretary, production from the facility shall be allocated among such persons in proportion to their respective ownership interests in the gross sales from such facility.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HDF77B04FFF034E3F84B49A586C092DFF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Related persons
                                 Persons shall be treated as related to each other if such persons would be treated as a single employer under the regulations prescribed under section 52(b). In the case of a corporation which is a member of an affiliated group of corporations filing a consolidated return, such corporation shall be treated as selling fuel to an unrelated person if such fuel is sold to such a person by another member of such group.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H5024C85C6474497583B86527965BB555"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 Pass-thru in the case of estates and trusts
                                 Under regulations prescribed by the Secretary, rules similar to the rules of subsection (d) of section 52 shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H50944ABE7DFF438199E6EC36A09C0574"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 Allocation of credit to patrons of agricultural cooperative
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45Y(g)(6) shall apply.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H04D25DAB0BD14576BDB35D8745C21EC5"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 Prevailing wage requirements
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H2DB18BDF27B844558F0E36EA55C848D0"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    Subject to subparagraph (B), rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(7) shall apply.
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H9CBA790259BD47878BC2CE24C1F48AA9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Special rule for facilities placed in service before January 1, 2025
                                    For purposes of subparagraph (A), in the case of any qualified facility placed in service before January 1, 2025—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HC79AA8F85C2344B2BB0FB1C43126F200"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       clause (i) of section 45(b)(7)(A) shall not apply, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBCE6800355934293B27235607C48CE85"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       clause (ii) of such section shall be applied by substituting <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">with respect to any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2024, for which the credit is allowed under this section for <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                                  quote-display-start="auto"
                                                  quote-type="text">with respect to any taxable year, for any portion of such taxable year which is within the period described in subsection (a)(2)(A)(ii).
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H45D3B9363191479EAEAD6F51EDC5C991"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (7)
                                 Apprenticeship requirements
                                 Rules similar to the rules of section 45(b)(8) shall apply.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H982F234DE59C4BE8A2FAD32127FA71D6"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (g)
                              Termination
                              This section shall not apply to transportation fuel sold after December 31, 2027.
                           
                        
                        .

               8
               Credit Monetization and Appropriations
               <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                         id="H18E6D33BDE2144A9AC58D02708036333"
                         qb-display-quote="yes"
                         section-type="subsequent-section">
                  13801.
                  ELECTIVE PAYMENT FOR ENERGY PROPERTY AND ELECTRICITY PRODUCED FROM CERTAIN RENEWABLE RESOURCES, ETC
                  <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                               id="H5EAF790FC0B149BC992E08A0AC0493A5"
                               qb-display-quote="yes">
                     (a)
                     In general
                     Subchapter B of chapter 65 is amended by inserting after section 6416 the following new section:
                     <quoted-block display-end-quotes="yes"
                                    display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                    display-quotes="yes"
                                    id="H0ABA2D1745AB49CCAAFB2AC1D48DBCCE"
                                    style="OLC">
                        <section display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                  id="HDA01C07D5CE3475F8D0CD4755ABD1951"
                                  qb-display-quote="yes"
                                  section-type="subsequent-section">
                           6417.
                           ELECTIVE PAYMENT OF APPLICABLE CREDITS
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H5B34DE17AAB24578BC6A115A7860088D"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (a)
                              In general
                              In the case of an applicable entity making an election (at such time and in such manner as the Secretary may provide) under this section with respect to any applicable credit determined with respect to such entity, such entity shall be treated as making a payment against the tax imposed by subtitle A (for the taxable year with respect to which such credit was determined) equal to the amount of such credit.
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HD9A4B2756528414DACDCE2DEFA635885"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (b)
                              Applicable credit
                              The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                         quote-display-start="auto"
                                         quote-type="text">applicable credit means each of the following:
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H6E7948F2E8C44C62A9823431F7C1AF38"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 So much of the credit for alternative fuel vehicle refueling property allowed under section 30C which, pursuant to subsection (d)(1) of such section, is treated as a credit listed in section 38(b).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H97B92744E0CB4B5D9DA65451EA271C9B"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 So much of the renewable electricity production credit determined under section 45(a) as is attributable to qualified facilities which are originally placed in service after December 31, 2022.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4C79F48DCAEB4AE0A0B8EB0AF6FA0DDE"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 So much of the credit for carbon oxide sequestration determined under section 45Q(a) as is attributable to carbon capture equipment which is originally placed in service after December 31, 2022.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H903C76718CD4486FAF77EE9B4859E294"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (4)
                                 The zero-emission nuclear power production credit determined under section 45U(a).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HFCFFE7A5F9E047B7B3D3FA3286F44E03"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (5)
                                 So much of the credit for production of clean hydrogen determined under section 45V(a) as is attributable to qualified clean hydrogen production facilities which are originally placed in service after December 31, 2012.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H7CF7383AB76E4A7FA35BE6B73EC802EB"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (6)
                                 In the case of a tax-exempt entity described in clause (i), (ii), or (iv) of section 168(h)(2)(A), the credit for qualified commercial vehicles determined under section 45W by reason of subsection (d)(3) thereof.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0513D53A505A4E43BC1196660D3E7612"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (7)
                                 The credit for advanced manufacturing production under section 45X(a).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4A9FD857F4144BDFB9C6B73E42935677"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (8)
                                 The clean electricity production credit determined under section 45Y(a).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H4D8848A0CB95410B9309A932ED291A19"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (9)
                                 The clean fuel production credit determined under section 45Z(a).
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HB3E68F89474C42DCBA497B7584E183D6"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (10)
                                 The energy credit determined under section 48.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HCBDC8A968AC84DC4930AEC4F820FD887"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (11)
                                 The qualifying advanced energy project credit determined under section 48C.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H481F3838215F4419B31E0275241953EF"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (12)
                                 The clean electricity investment credit determined under section 48E.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="HC73C4C642B034F27A216C0C424C1967D"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (c)
                              Application to partnerships and S corporations
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H1C40B6BFF2CE453ABB3585ABC85ACBC5"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 In general
                                 In the case of any applicable credit determined with respect to any facility or property held directly by a partnership or S corporation, any election under subsection (a) shall be made by such partnership or S corporation. If such partnership or S corporation makes an election under such subsection (in such manner as the Secretary may provide) with respect to such credit—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HD7CB744AA10D478CAEA4209413720D41"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    the Secretary shall make a payment to such partnership or S corporation equal to the amount of such credit,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HA3275E7717B74B99A87907430728182E"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    subsection (e) shall be applied with respect to such credit before determining any partner’s distributive share, or shareholder’s pro rata share, of such credit,
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H580DF2D78CD245B386CCB528EC4E3929"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    any amount with respect to which the election in subsection (a) is made shall be treated as tax exempt income for purposes of sections 705 and 1366, and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H60CC2C2333A74367B9F91EB835DC9050"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    a partner’s distributive share of such tax exempt income shall be based on such partner’s distributive share of the otherwise applicable credit for each taxable year.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H84C6148AEB3F44589BC9801A5BB80C80"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Coordination with application at partner or shareholder level
                                 In the case of any facility or property held directly by a partnership or S corporation, no election by any partner or shareholder shall be allowed under subsection (a) with respect to any applicable credit determined with respect to such facility or property.
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HF6FEFF4ABDEA406985FA0160ADFD97AD"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Treatment of payments to partnerships and S corporations
                                 For purposes of section 1324 of title 31, United States Code, the payments under paragraph (1)(A) shall be treated in the same manner as a refund due from a credit provision referred to in subsection (b)(2) of such section.
                              
                           
                           <subsection display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                        id="H8DF53C1FE0084B348DAA83DBCC9315B0"
                                        qb-display-quote="yes">
                              (d)
                              Special rules
                              For purposes of this section—
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H0219B1201EA5496D99C5BCA8690445B1"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (1)
                                 Applicable entity
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HCC2D8B5613AE414FACF06B7D738359A4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    The term <quote quote-display-end="auto"
                                               quote-display-start="auto"
                                               quote-type="text">applicable entity means—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H349F2BB8532A4EB48B441416214174C2"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       any organization exempt from the tax imposed by subtitle A, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H31546DC2ACB74FB6A5B8196EF761292A"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       any State or political subdivision thereof, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H65978DA3A2944D18BCCAD2C1ED03A165"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       the Tennessee Valley Authority, 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H091C12A94D2948E6BF67AB2684B5B7A0"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iv)
                                       an Indian tribal government (as defined in section 30D(g)(9)), 
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H91B0506A4C3348CB84B863786647271C"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (v)
                                       any Alaska Native Corporation (as defined in section 3 of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act (43 U.S.C. 1602(m)), or
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H11F33C8A0EC94B039E217248C2210068"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (vi)
                                       any corporation operating on a cooperative basis which is engaged in furnishing electric energy to persons in rural areas.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HB43B94262B2148F8A6A664F7FFB726E4"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Election with respect to credit for production of clean hydrogen
                                    If a taxpayer other than an entity described in subparagraph (A) makes an election under this subparagraph with respect to any taxable year in which such taxpayer has placed in service a qualified clean hydrogen production facility (as defined in section 45V(c)(3)), such taxpayer shall be treated as an applicable entity for purposes of this section for such taxable year, but only with respect to the credit described in subsection (b)(5).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H658EE126230D431BB04F837380D29302"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Election with respect to credit for carbon oxide sequestration
                                    If a taxpayer other than an entity described in subparagraph (A) makes an election under this subparagraph with respect to any taxable year in which such taxpayer has, after December 31, 2022, placed in service carbon capture equipment at a qualified facility (as defined in section 45Q(d)), such taxpayer shall be treated as an applicable entity for purposes of this section for such taxable year, but only with respect to the credit described in subsection (b)(3).
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H680CEB53309845C6905E2C17741EC84D"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (D)
                                    Election with respect to advanced manufacturing production credit
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HA84776FC2B3B4E0081FDF3D4AB2B90AE"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       If a taxpayer other than an entity described in subparagraph (A) makes an election under this subparagraph with respect to any taxable year in which such taxpayer has, after December 31, 2022, produced eligible components (as defined in section 45X(c)(1)), such taxpayer shall be treated as an applicable entity for purposes of this section for such taxable year, but only with respect to the credit described in subsection (b)(7).
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HDB1CDE9243C44B2CAA543609D6A2B0CE"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Limitation
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H1A8525E9CD1245329A8A01E9241029E9"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          In general
                                          Except as provided in subclause (II), if a taxpayer makes an election under this subparagraph with respect to any taxable year, such taxpayer shall be treated as having made such election for each of the 4 succeeding taxable years ending before January 1, 2033.
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H3D88042084B146969036197F9B62E18A"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          Exception
                                          A taxpayer may elect to revoke the application of the election made under this subparagraph to any taxable year described in subclause (I). Any such election, if made, shall apply to the applicable year specified in such election and each subsequent taxable year within the period described in subclause (I). Any election under this subclause may not be subsequently revoked. 
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB7F9C61A702D4D0980D021C45FEBC680"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       Prohibition on transfer
                                       For any taxable year described in clause (ii)(I), no election may be made by the taxpayer under section 6418(a) for such taxable year with respect to eligible components for purposes of the credit described in subsection (b)(7).
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H8F311B165BD14DA7B001BB2A2D616DF9"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (E)
                                    Other rules
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H90EE5CBD670A4F73AB7DDF23E8D0C3C3"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       An election made under subparagraph (B), (C), or (D) shall be made at such time and in such manner as the Secretary may provide.
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H85AB9E3F359943B9A42503D195E9418E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Limitation
                                       No election may be made under subparagraph (B), (C), or (D) with respect to any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2032.
                                    
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="HBA118317EE9D4A9BA953C53EBE109D6C"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (2)
                                 Application
                                 In the case of any applicable entity which makes the election described in subsection (a), any applicable credit shall be determined—
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H149479A971A047DE9C72BAFB5EC5255B"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    without regard to paragraphs (3) and (4)(A)(i) of section 50(b), and
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HABAD4B4DA8704963B2F0BF2B32057CFB"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    by treating any property with respect to which such credit is determined as used in a trade or business of the applicable entity.
                                 
                              
                              <paragraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                          id="H2B0FA4ABCE1A4AA093575AAB5480DBE6"
                                          qb-display-quote="yes">
                                 (3)
                                 Elections
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H134C5339447540FBA8A1B5EA91EA2374"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (A)
                                    In general
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H0D3B94C91DF24DDB9D225E5C2800CE4E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       Due date
                                       Any election under subsection (a) shall be made not later than—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HDAD1C0D1BE0C458F88EE5DE5D7A3E9CA"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          in the case of any government, or political subdivision, described in paragraph (1) and for which no return is required under section 6011 or 6033(a), such date as is determined appropriate by the Secretary, or
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H72E35A4D50D849B687EAE304F6A5C0AD"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          in any other case, the due date (including extensions of time) for the return of tax for the taxable year for which the election is made, but in no event earlier than 180 days after the date of the enactment of this section.
                                       
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H923E10E5491F4094B87692C47FD5ECB6"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       Additional rules
                                       Any election under subsection (a), once made, shall be irrevocable and shall apply (except as otherwise provided in this paragraph) with respect to any credit for the taxable year for which the election is made.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="H4D6DA9EFCF32420D982EF1C98FB79F6F"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (B)
                                    Renewable electricity production credit
                                    In the case of the credit described in subsection (b)(2), any election under subsection (a) shall—
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="H3F7F9C1724054DB4829A32776B7A4730"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       apply separately with respect to each qualified facility,
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HB4DC3724556740F6A037C1D28E11D274"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (ii)
                                       be made for the taxable year in which such qualified facility is originally placed in service, and
                                    
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HEC7396E091954C0596837F9D64CBBF84"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (iii)
                                       shall apply to such taxable year and to any subsequent taxable year which is within the period described in subsection (a)(2)(A)(ii) of section 45 with respect to such qualified facility.
                                    
                                 
                                 <subparagraph display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                id="HCDC4FE16AB09499582E6B63CB2E83E47"
                                                qb-display-quote="yes">
                                    (C)
                                    Credit for carbon oxide sequestration
                                    <clause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                             id="HBBCB2F82F49541DD83C13893BC4BA01E"
                                             qb-display-quote="yes">
                                       (i)
                                       In general
                                       In the case of the credit described in subsection (b)(3), any election under subsection (a) shall—
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="H7E8973080257453485F33EB7007E6D65"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (I)
                                          apply separately with respect to the carbon capture equipment originally placed in service by the applicable entity during a taxable year, and
                                       
                                       <subclause display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                   id="HCD20D339D0764971A37FA9716646353B"
                                                   qb-display-quote="yes">
                                          (II)
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
                                                 id="H5D1DDFB5BCA44B5CA28C53311643AFBE"
                                                 qb-display-quote="yes">
                                             (aa)
                                             in the case of a taxpayer who makes an election described in paragraph (1)(C), apply to the taxable year in which such equipment is placed in service and the 4 subsequent taxable years with respect to such equipment which end before January 1, 2033, and
                                          
                                          <item display-inline="no-display-inline"
